I am dropping a star because I don't get anything close to the advertised 200 miles worth of range, but I also didn't expect to. My TV doesn't recognize channels broadcasting more than about 30 miles away.

I thought I'd take a $20 dollar chance on this device, since the other alternative was $50 per month from the local cable company.  Wow!  I was surprised!  This little device brings in all of the local channels (20 of them) crystal clear. Like everyone else in the new decade I stream everything so I canceled my Charter after searching high and low for an antenna to get my local channels.  The set up was quick and easy.  I put the antenna on the wall next to my TV searched for channels and it found 26 channels. It doesn't buffer a lot and the cords are long enough to move around.  They provide you with everything in the box you need to installation even extra adhesive to stick it to wherever you want to.

I got this to get live TV, particularly to hear the news in the morning. When I switch to a different tv, facing the backyard, certain channels lag as there’s blockage.  However it is so much better than having rabbit ears and the price is on point.  The length of the cable is enough for me but if you’re going to drag it far from the window, you may want a bit more length.  Mine works great when it’s placed against the window.  If it faces South, you don’t even need it up against the window.  It works if it’s close enough.  I would recommend this product for sure!

I purchased this antenna for my basement guest room.  I am totally amazed!  It works even better than I could have imagined. I'd been watching the market for HDTV antennas and came across your product. I bought three antennas.  Cost all three was less than one month DIRECT TV bill.  I wished had done it before.Installation is pretty simple and extremely easy for anyone to do it.

I received the Ultra-thin HDTV Antenna from Amazon today and installed it in about 15 minutes. The instructions with illustrations were clear. I had the TV re-scan for channels and pulled in 105.  Installed it on the north window on the first story using the two-sided stickers.  It's hidden by the top curtain and virtually invisible.  We're about 35 miles from downtown among hills that tend to block signals so I needed an antenna that would amplify the signals.  We cut the cord with cable because we mostly watch the local channels anyway and are saving ourselves $80 a month.  Unfortunately, the cable company doubled our internet bill because we no longer bundle, but the savings per month are worth it.

The only reason I ordered this product is because my roommate and I only have internet that includes all the streaming services.  What those don't provide is Jeopardy.  I now get the 5 main channels (along with 130 other digital channels).  I live a few miles outside of Boston and the picture quality is incredible.  I have a 4K TV and after setup, the default channel, which had a Big10 basketball game on, looked exactly like 4K definition.  The only drawback is my location within the house.  I had to place the antenna in a more interior location, and when it rains hard with heavy cloud cover, the signal is spotty (to be expected).  Still, I'd much rather deal with that occasionally for a one time price of $27.99 than continuously pay monthly for cable.  I highly recommend this digital antenna for anyone looking to stick it to the cable company!  Worth every penny.

Great reception and it's not blocking my view out a window. I laid it on top of a bookcase and can't even see it.  I connected it to my old DirecTV connection in my den. With game time getting closer and closer we were all trying to figure out what to do or where to go. The following day I ordered on online at Amazon.com, I hooked it up when it arrived two days later and I could not be happier as this was a newer model and it works great!!!

I purchased this antenna to try to get some local channels on my 2nd TV that has no cable tv access.  The antenna is amazingly sensitive about receiving channels.  In my situation, I have only west-facing windows in that room.  TV stations are about 50 miles due north and 60 miles due east of my home.  I pull in 16 channels from the north including a few UHF channels surprisingly.  Some of these channels aren't even on my cable subscription for my primary television, which is a plus!.  ALL my channels have 4 & 5 bars reception and excellent audio!  I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase.  Sure saved me a bundle of $$$ by not having to install an outdoor antenna and rotor!

It was a simple plug-in to the TV, and since we live in an urban area, short range setting is fine. At first, it was glitchy when resting the antenna at the back of the TV stand, where our TV found 18 channels, but glitchy off-and-on. Then, when placing the antenna higher up on the wall with some simple wall putty, it found 40 channels and is clear.

I just received mine last night.  The web pages for coverage was less than helpful.  I took a chance anyway.  I wanted to get the local.  I set it up using less than 35 miles and long range.  No real difference.  Scanned for channels.  Move the antenna.  Scanned. Moved.  About 30 minutes box to finish.  I am getting about 25 channels.  Some I won't use (in Spanish or shopping networks)

I purchased an HD antenna for my home about 6 months ago so I can watch the news and weather when cable is out. Setting up this antenna was very easy and took less than 5 minutes to complete. After turning on the TV, I switched the channel to the local news and had a crystal clear picture. I have used this many times as I tend to lose cable during storms and the antenna always worked.A couple months after installing the antenna, I cancelled cable as I realized that many of the channels I paid for with cable I could watch for free with the antenna. This was a great purchase and would definitely recommend it to everyone.

We live in a rural area of the Ozarks. My tv satellite provider blocked one of our local channels so I checked out this antenna. I was skeptical it would draw a signal at all. We place in in a window near the tv and WALLA!!!! The signal is as clear as my satellite providers. I deleted the local package from my provider and no longer pay them $12 per month. Take that satellite provider. I suppose you could say we "dished" them.

Very lightweight very easy to install. Lots of different options for installation I enjoyed the switch for close towers to long tower distance.  I have mine mounted high Between two windows facing north and east I get tons of channels and the scanning was simple I’m not very technical oriented so this is a great option for me definitely recommend.

After weeks of fighting with an old antenna on my RV I ordered an HDTV Antenna thinking what do I have to lose. I hooked it up and reprogramed my TV and immediately got 55 channels, all with crystal clear pictures.  I even hooked the antenna into a splitter for another TV and the results were the same, great pictures on both TV's.  I have since travelled across Arizona, Texas, New Mexico, Oklahoma and Missouri and continue to have great results.I look forward to getting the additional antenna to use in my permanent home.

I purchased this antenna from amazon for my camper, in which I have a small TV. I also like that the antenna works off USB allowing me to power it and the TV from my 12 volt system.  It is a good product; small , light, easy to use and it is a nice addition to my camping.

I am very pleased with the quality and 50 channels I am able to enjoy daily, including local channels, saving $65 monthly to a cable company! As soon as I plugged in this antena to my tv I was able to watch the channel I was previously watching. I couldn’t believe I didn’t have to scan for channels. So far I am happy wit this purchase. I am able to receive many (around 60) channels with very clear crisp picture quality. Being able to watch football this weekend was great removing the issue with some web based options. Initially, I placed it on the stand just to see how many channels I could receive. After trial and error with placement (and I’m sure it could be moved again), I settled on the location above the tv. I was slightly off from my target area and because the adhesive is so strong (pulled part of the wall when I attempted to move it) I left it where it was. That would be my biggest gripe. An additional set of adhesive tabs would be helpful for those who need to reposition.

Before buying the  Digital U Must Have HDTV antenna, we were  very concerned that we may not be able to get good reception in my home, located in a suburban Philadelphia in Pennsylvania that is surrounded by hundreds of big trees on all sides. I've tried a lot of different mounting options, and the only one that works requires this antenna to be on a window facing the majority of your broadcast directions, or outside, which it isn't rated for. I have a North and South facing window I tried this on, and I will gain/lose channels depending on which window I use. I am only 24 miles from dead center Columbus, OH, and I can't get the majority of channels like GRIT, COMET, etc. I also tried the long and short range options it has.

I had been missing the programming for my local PBS channel, even though I had installed a major antenna on the roof of my building a few years ago.  Thinking, “Why not spend the $30 and see if the Amplified HD Digital TV Antenna does anything?” I bought one on Amazon.When the HDTV Antenna got here a couple of days later, I was surprised at how simple the device was.  It took less than 10 minutes to read the installation instruction manual and set it up.  I was a little disappointed that it could only serve one television in my house, but it DID bring in the local channels I was missing plus fifty more on that device.  The additional bonus was that the antenna lies flat and discreet on the side of a bookcase (held by three 3M command strips) and still grabs stations without my obscuring a window.

Had a cable outage last week for over a full day and we had no internet and no television.  We decided to try a antenna to get whatever local HDTV stations were available, so that we never have a complete TV outage again.We checked Amazon HDTV reviews and picked your product:

I am very happy with my purchase of the extra HDTV antenna. Normally my husband and I have challenges with setting up new technology but this was a complete and utter breeze. Not to mention the fact that we’ve canceled cable and now we have pretty much all the channels that we really wanted to begin with for one time fee which was completely affordable. I’ve been telling all my friends and family about this and my sister purchased one too recently and seems to be very happy with hers.

I was skeptical of this antenna because of the distance to the stations I wanted to receive. I live in a small midwest city in a single story house with a crawlspace attic, mostly flat terrain with no forests to speak of. TV is a TCL with Roku, mounted on the wall in the living room with a 8' ceiling. My gut said go with a big powerful outdoor antenna. But I've been reading that indoor powered antennas are better now. So with all that being said, if you're not in a big city where TV stations broadcast, you need to try harder to get TV reception. You're probably patient or at least willing to experiment a bit. If so this could be the antenna for you. For starters, the first 3 attempts were disappointing. We have a PBS broadcast in our city. ABC, CBS, Fox & NBC transmitters are all 45-50 miles away. I knew I'd need to use the amp. After installing, I tried near the TV twice and the 3rd time in the window. Nothing besides the 3 channels from the local PBS station. Before getting upset, I tried dangling it out the window and I was able to get a couple more stations. Ok. Next, I moved it to on top of the roof and I was able to get all the stations I was hoping to except NBC which is a VHS channel. Cool!  But I wasn't going to leave it on the roof. Then, I ended up drilling a hole into the garage from the living room and moving the antenna into the attic. Same result. 3 out of 4 networks. I emailed support and they were quick to respond. They said reset the preamp and then scan again, it will enable VHS. I couldn't believe it but it actually worked!!! So why no 5 stars? Well, some evenings I can't get all of the channels. It seems weather related. Breezy & stormy evenings affect signal. Tonight is warm, clear & calm and I've got 3-5 bars, receiving 23 stations. The 4 big networks & 2 PBS with all their sub channels plus an independent station. So before football season, I may have to get an outdoor antenna, as I wouldn't host a party trusting this antenna. I like the price, I like the optional USB amp, I like the long coax cable, and support seems good. The inconsistency is my biggest gripe. Pro tips: Know your directions and/or use a compass app. Also, the amp itself affects signal. After installation, I hid it behind the TV and lost some reception. When I let it dangle, all the stations came back. Quirky af. Lastly consider a mount once you find the antenna's happy place. Any slight movement could eff up your reception.

I doubted this would work on a TV about 20 miles out of town.  Hung the antenna on the wall, plugged the antenna into the amp, plugged the ac adapter into the amp, and plugged the amp into the TV.  5 minute setup at most.  30 channels from Lubbock, Texas!!  WOW.  and the picture quality is great.  I'm buying one for the RV now.

So easy to set up. Took less than one minute. The picture is clear and I get around thirty channels. I bought one a year or so ago for my tv in my kitchen. This upgraded, newer edition one, I just bought and installed is for the large tv in my living room. My son thought I had signed up for Spectrum Cable it is so clear. Thank you! If I can set it up at age 65, anyone can.😁

We have finally decided to cut the cord this year.  We were a bit hesitant because we have been use to having live television in our daily lives.  After doing some research, we came across this HDTV antenna.  The range it offered and clear quality and price, it sounded too good to be true.  After the easy installation and channel scan, we were able to get more over the air channels than we would have expected.  The quality was crystal clear.  The signal was exceptional. I live in a rural area outside of Eugene Oregon. I have a guest house on the property that has no cable or satellite. I have been using an RCA HDTV antenna for years in the guest house and only receive 6 stations. 2 of those stations always seem to have reception issues.I decided to try this (U Must Have) antenna because of all the good reviews on Amazon. I just installed it today and it works terrific! I now receive 9 channels and all of them have great reception!

The major channels 2,4,5,7,9,11,&13 the picture is great!  There are lots of other channels, foreign language channels so happy I purchased I’m ready at last to cut the cord!

This was definitely not what I expected.  It is extremely lightweight and pretty much all in one solution. I wasn't able to get all of my local channels but I got many more than what I was able to get with my old antenna.  Note: my best reception was when the antenna was sitting in the window.

We used this antenna on our smart tv and are very pleased. It was easy to install, easy to set up, great price point. We actually get more channels with this hdtv antenna than we did our old antenna. Picture is clear. Channels come in better than before. It comes with stickies to have the option of sticking to the wall, which in our case provides better reception. Than it laying on the tv center. It also comes with a very long cord for convenience.

With rabbit ear antennas I was picking up around 35 channels, but with this I’m getting about 55 channels, so that’s impressive. It’s definitely worth it.I haven’t fully installed it yet, because I’m waiting to make sure I have it where I want it. Different places around the house will give you better or worse reception. Right now it’s hanging on my blinds.

I just have to say how great this antenna is. I have tried others in the past that did not live up to the hype but this one is fantastic. First I set it up lying flat on the table and I got over 45 channels. My local 10 had a week signal soI set it up in the window next and it picked up over 80 with multiple channel 10s. I have since attached it to a Fire TV recast and I have a great channel guide and DVR ability on every fire enabled TV in my house. I had no idea there were so many channels out there for free. This is a great antenna for over the air HDTV.

Today I received my HDTV Antenna and with in 5 minutes of opening the box I had it set up and ready to go.I took the antenna out of the box attached the amplifier. Next I found the antenna port on the back of the tv and connected it. Next I plugged in the amplifier. Then I found the settings on my tv and had it search for channels. i purchased this product for my mom who is a nursing home. the cable they offered was dismally blurry and at $25 a month, i thought perhaps something over the air might be better suited to her needs. the one word that comes to mind concerning this antenna is - fantastic. she now does not need to juggle two remotes, one for the tv and one for the cable box, and the station clarity is phenomenal. her tv has never looked so clear. setup was effortless. making a few adjustments in the placement gave her upwards of 60 channels. we whittled this down to her 25 favorites and she could not be happier.

It is important to do you research before purchasing an indoor antenna to understand where the towers are in respect to your home so that you know how many miles you are trying to pull a signal from. I was amazed to see the number of channels more I could receive after moving the antenna a few feet over and higher to the ceiling!  Once you do you research for how far away you are from the towers, then I would recommend getting an amplified antenna so that you have the option to use it amplified or not.  Also, this antenna was great in that it has a USB wall plug in case you are already utilizing all the open USB ports on your TV.  The instructions are very easy to follow for set-up.  Do remember that after each re-positioning of the antenna you will need to re-search for the channels.  Again all these instructions are clearly outlined in the manual and even some of the less-techy folks (such as myself) should have minimal issues installing the antenna.  I am so happy to start saving over $1,000/year by getting rid of the poor quality Spectrum cable!  This antenna is streaming in some of the local channels in higher resolution than cable as well! I get 8 channels altogether from the Springfield area and the reception for these is excellent. Unfortunately I don’t get CBS which airs the Patriots games. I’m a big fan!Given the difficulties of my area, I am quite satisfied with your product.

When I first purchased this, it was an upgrade from a cheap Walmart one. When I tried it I only got two channels and was very disappointed. Then one day I had to unplug it. When I plugged it back in I noticed a brown light glowing from the from the cord. I saw there was a switch, and flipped it. The light turned green so I decided to rescan. Boom, over fifty channels. Sad I wasted time (probably was in the instructions), but glad I didn't waste money. If it isn't working out how you'd like, try the switch.

My family and I recently cut the cable cord, but with football returning, we wanted a way to watch the local channels and catch some games. We began searching for an antenna option that would meet our needs. I ordered this one because it such great reviews. The reviews are accurate. The product set up in minutes it was so easy! I received all local channels crystal clear. I actually think the picture is even better then when I had a cable connection. The we also got some other channels that I wasn’t expecting. I am very impressed with this product!

Simple purchase on Amazon for what seemed to be a fair price.  Comes with installation instructions which were fairly easy to follow.  Able to set up in a couple of minutes.  Once I had the TV scan for various over the air signals for channels available, was able to see over 100 become available.  Many are the local channels with more than one feed with varied programming, and many are foreign language channels.  The clarity of the image was really good for most of the channels.  Very satisfied with the purchase.

So tired of DISH blocking local networks, this time it’s FOX right before the Super Bowl. This unit arrived so fast, and was up and airing all our locals plus more (37 channels in total) in under 10 minutes (TV air and cable scan included) Now we have this antenna we changed our DISH package and are saving nearly $90 monthly.Couldn’t be happier. (Us, not DISH)

I've had three digital antennas in the past few years, trying to find the one that worked the best. The first one I got (a different brand) had a range of 30 miles, then I had one that reached 60. This one reaches up to 200 miles, and is the best one I've had so far. With this one, I never have to adjust or move it to pick up certain channels, and the picture never freezes on me. Practically never. Very clear picture. I wish all the digital antennas could be hidden from view, but if I'm going to use one, this is the best one I've had by performance. Highly recommend it!
The antenna looks and works just as advertised. I’m glad I purchased it. Please send me my free bonus antenna.
This doesn’t even pick up channels that my $10.00 ones - I have two - clearly do. I wanted to pick up some others. The advertising is false. Greatly exaggerated.

We were looking for a less expensive way to watch TV in a bedroom and our kitchen because we only use them for local stations.  We previously were renting a cable box for $12.00 a month each! We chose the HGTV Simple Antenna because of the positive reviews, reasonable cost and promise of easy installation.  We live 100 miles away from our Green Bay, Wisconsin stations. Now we wonder why we didn't do this sooner. Everyone of our expectations have been meet. Very pleased.

This antenna is the best that I've ever had. With other antenna's I could only get about 9 stations, with this one, I could get around 40-46 depending on the weather.  I work in a metal building and bet if you were in a regular brick and mortar environment, that you could probably get more channels.  It was so easy to install.  I just stuck it on the window, scanned the tv and wallah had channels that I've never had before.  I highly recommend this antenna!!  Thanks for making such a great product.

I purchased this antenna so that I could stop paying exorbitant rates to DIRECTV.  The antenna was easy to install and was able to get all of the local channels in the area.  The high-definition picture is beautiful.  Thank you for making my transition from cable to streaming an easy one.!

We finally cut all cable cords completely. We were paying for basic tv with Comcast because it was $10 extra a month with our internet plan. But what i didn’t know was all the added fees ($30!!! Don’t believe me look at your broadcast fee, sport fee, tv franchise fee, etc) for watching less than 12 channels. I purchased this HD antenna and get so many channels with crystal clear picture! I am so happy with this purchase and the amount of money I will be saving from fees with cable companies.

This product is amazing.  I live on a ground floor unit of an apartment complex and where my unit sits doesn’t get very good reception with any other antenna’s I’ve had.  I decided to try this one as the reviews were very good but I wasn’t going to get my hopes up given the experience I had with previous antenna’s.  This was very easy to setup and once I scanned for channels, I have WAY MORE channels than I did before.  The picture comes out so clear and it doesn’t cut in and out.  I am very happy with this one and I highly recommend this product.

I have been using the indoor HDTV antenna for about a month now and it is fantastic. All of my local stations come through in true high definition and, if the signals are weak, there are standard def channels as an option (but really difficult to watch on a large screen tv!). I have coupled my antenna with an Amazon Recast box, so can record two different channels at a time and skip ads. After the initial outlay for the pieces, my TV viewing  is free, free, free!

First in order for these antennas to work(even the cheapest ones) you need to have a clear line of sight of broadcasting antenna, even if you can't visually see it, you will have to have your antenna facing that direction. But if you live around high hills or down in a hollow, and the hills block broadcasting antenna, you won't pick up a thing , no matter how expensive or how many miles it claims to pick up signals. In that case you will need satellite or cable or wifi type service and pay for reception and internet stuff.

After recently cutting the cord on cable, I purchased this product after seeing its great reviews.  Not only was it easy to attach (both to my TV and go the wall), but I was pleasantly surprised by its light weight and small size which easily mounts (and holds) with a simple adhesive strip rather than screws. Given this small size, I was especially surprised to find that it is able to pick up 30 over-the-air channels where I live, even without using the inline amplifier included with the antenna. I’m very satisfied with this purchase.

This may be the best product I have ever bought from Amazon! I live in the country south of Corpus Christi, Texas. Take 2 mins to put up and plug into the tv. I now pick up 21 channels from Corpus Christi. All broadcast networks, me tv, Laff, tv and more. The broadcast stations are all in HD. Clean crisp picture on all channels . Thank you for a product that truly lives up to its hype. I will buy another one and put up . 10 Stars .

We bought an HDTV antenna recently, and we found it really easy to use. It gave us the ability to watch local channels without any hassle. It was a good value for our money as well. We are about 50 miles from NYC and we are still getting a good signal. The only negative is that it took a while to place the antenna in the right position, so it would get a good signal. But overall, we like this product very much and will recommend it to our friends and family!

We purchased the HDTV antenna through Amazon because we are trying to cut the cable!When we first hooked it up we used the amplifier, assuming, of course you will need it, and we weren’t getting anything until we took that off.

Excellent upgrade over my previous OTA antenna. The range is fantastic and the added length of the coaxial cable is a definite bonus as you can place it anywhere to improve reception if needed. The channels are crisp and clear with no background hiss or interference. The company also included double sided tape. Quality construction and quick delivery. Would recommend to anyone needing an OTA antenna to supplement a cable installation or just drop cable altogether. Be sure to check your local area first for broadcast channels to see if you are located in an saturated with signals from tv providers.

Antenna was easy to install.  Seems to work great.  Hopefully that will be the end of weak signals.But.... the warranty activation and fee antenna offer .... both by email..... is cheesy.  Fingers crossed I won't need the former and life goes on without the latter.

I live out in the country or “off the grid” as my family calls it. We can’t get WiFi and signal is usually bad, especially when it storms. I purchased this and it has made a world of difference compared to our old antenna. It’s easy to install and I love how it can be place virtually anywhere. Would definitely purchase again and highly recommend.

Instructions could be better. We used without the amplifier for best quality. It was a challenge to figure out how to scan for channels but once we figured it out(took three of us to do that) and scanned for channels three times in a row we ended up with 28 channels. That’s worth the 28.00 price. Satisfied so far on day one.

I purchased the Digital Indoor HDTV Antenna through Amazon.  The package did not have the extended amplifier in it that was supposed to come with the order.  However, the company shipped a new one right away.  The antenna works great.  I am in a new subdivision as I just purchased a house and the antenna signal is really strong.  Initially, I was able to pick up only 39 channels, but now with the extended amplifier, I am able to pick up 61 channels.  This has been a tremendous help as I go through cable withdraw as I recently cut the cord to expensive cable.  The Antenna is in the window and is not high on a wall or far from the TV.  I'm sure I can probably get even more channels if I moved the antenna around a bit, but I'm highly satisfied as is.  The picture quality is top notch as well.

I don’t have cable, so I bought an antenna to be able to watch the local news, but this antenna has FAR exceeded my expectations! I would’ve been content with just a few channels like ABC, NBC and CBS, but I have over 45 channels! It’s awesome! There’s no pixelating and the color is very clear. My TV is next to a window, so I’m sure that helps. I placed the antenna flat next to the TV since I don’t need to hang it up. I’m very pleased with this antenna, highly recommend!

I ordered this indoor antenna and I am very happy with it so far.  I needed local channels since I'm removing DirecTv so I researched and found this antenna had the best customer reviews.  It took me all of 5 minutes to connect it to my unsmart TV and mount it in my window.  Using the TV remote, the channels added themselves automatically.  I had a little trouble with only 1 local channel but all I had to do was move the antenna a little. I only have 40 channels but that's more than I'll actually watch.  Thank you for an easy setup and even better cost.

This HDTV antenna was just what I was looking for and happy to be able to use it and give my honest opinion. The directions show that this antenna (being flat) can be placed on a Window with the stick-ons – or wall.This is very handy and easy to install.TV antennas used to be big and bulky, and not very effective. Technology really has come a long way… It’s gotten better, lighter, and smaller – like this one. Thank you.

This is a great product and so easy to get working. Connect it to your television and run the channel scan, that's it!I have been connected to cable for years spending literally hundreds of dollars for television which I only now realize I could have been enjoying for free.
I bought my first Ultra-thin HDTV Antenna from Amazon which arrived on 11/3/2019.I set it up the next day in my upstairs bedroom. The instructions were easy and clear.

I live in South Austin in a neighborhood that is quite a bit lower in elevation than other areas because it is near Barton Creek and I live near several dry creeks that flow there if and when it rains. The back of my house faces almost due north and the major broadcast antennas are about eight miles north.  I have an antenna on my roof for one TV and a  Moku Leaf on another facing north and I get about 50 channels on each. THIS antenna I put on a window facing south for a little TV in my kitchen. Nothing has been able to bring in many signals (even the Moku Leaf and it is one of the best I've tried). I get over 50 with this antenna.

Wow!  54 + channels.  Extremely easy to install.  Very impressed with number of channels, installation, picture / sound quality.  All for free.  Purchased in case Roku / Hulu isn’t available.  Getting 3 more and Cutting the cable next week.Update:  still working very well.  Bought 3 more and they’re working great.

This antenna can receive about 80% of the broadcast stations in our area, but it took some time to find the right antenna position. It works best near a window up high, so we put it next to a skylight on the ceiling. The cable would be much less obvious if it was white instead of black.Unfortunately our LED track lights interfere with almost all the channels We can't watch them when the lights are on, but that is more of an issue with the lights than with the antenna. Fortunately we have other lights and don't have to watch TV in the dark.

I had the 'Free TV Key' antenna before finding this gem. With the old antenna, the picture was constantly cutting out, and I got very few channels. I was a little hesitant to buy this one, but after reading all of the reviews, I went for it. And I am SO glad I did! Not only do I receive several more channels, but my shows NEVER cut out like they did before! This is a great antenna, and well worth the money!

I purchased and installed this HDTV antenna for a television located in the lower level of my house, and was amazed as to how easy and fast it was to install, and how many channels I can receive.  Many more than I expected to get.  Installation instructions were clear, and it only took me about ten minutes to set everything up.  I placed the actual antenna on the top sill of the lower window of a double hung window.  Reception is outstanding.  I would recommend this antenna to anyone who wants reception to local broadcast stations without having to install an outside antenna, or having to subscribe to cable for television reception.  This antenna is a winner!

I once purchased an (overpriced) HD antenna thinking I would get the best reception (because I paid more).  I was wrong, the overpriced antenna did not work well at all.  Because of this experience, I was reluctant to purchase another one.  I saw the GESOBYTE antenna online and it had great reviews.  I ordered it and connected it within 5 minutes!  Ran my channel scan and I had channels over-the-air that I didn't even know existed.  Quality is great and I like the short/long range switch.  This was super easy to connect and I was watching HD over-the-air in minutes.  Thank you Gesobyte!!

I've proudly cut the cable cord for over 10 years now but getting local channels clearly via antenna has not always been the most even exchange. This week I tried a different product than I normally do and am so pleased. First, the cord is actually long enough that I can move it around the room as needed. Second, I get more channels now that my previous antenna and the interference I used to have to tolerate during my local news hour is no longer an issue. Finally, because the antenna is flexible I can mount it anywhere.Thanks! Very happy with this product and I will recommend.

First off I'm about 25 miles from the nearest broadcast tower and I was only able to pick up 30 channels, and not all of them were watchable. It took me about 30 minutes to find a "sweet spot" where the antenna picked up good reception and was able to view a few tv shows the first night with little freezing or loss of reception. 24 hours later I couldn't watch any channels without the picture and sound going in and out, on any channel. I scanned for channels again and it didn't fix the issue. How is it that it works fine one day, and then all of a sudden the next day it doesn't? I don't have the patience to move the antenna again and find another good spot so I'm just returning it.

We were excited to get our HDTV antenna today.  We have tried to do digital antenna’s probably 6 years ago and were not able to get any service.  We thought we would give it a shot again so we could see local news.  We felt it was very necessary with everything going on with the Corona Virus.  It was very easy to install, we put the antenna in the window.  we were able to get 8 channels.  3 of which we will watch - NBC, CBS and CW.  Since those are the networks we watch the most, were were very happy with it.  We live on the edge of the Adirondack mountains in a wooded area so we are just happy we can get service without cable tv.

I just received and set up my Amplified HD Digital TV Antenna.  I bought it to replace an older antenna that I broke off the pull up antenna part.  First off, it took me less than 10 minutes to set up and I love the added Amplifier Signal Booster. I also like the extra long 18 foot cable that reaches a window. That is one of the main reasons I purchased this antenna, besides the streamline look of it.  I now get 179 Digital Channels, more channels than I got with my previous antenna.  I am just amazed at this product, and I am so very happy with my purchase.

I love this antenna!  I just moved into a new place in Wilmington NC and had no cable service.  Thought I would give this a try before looking at cable options.  With this antenna, I have ALL the channels that I need or want, which includes all major networks.  Very easy to install- just plug it in.I am never going back to paying for cable.

Plugging the antenna into a bus port or placing into electric outlet makes no difference on quality of image.  One does not make it more clearer than the other, the clarity is already very good.  The best feature of this antenna is there has been no picture static on any tv program, no gap between switching channels, cords are long to allow for flexible placement, stickers for mounting, clear readable instructions.  The documentation makes it appear as though the company has taken considerable effort to ensure quality and user satisfaction. The tv picture  responds to tv picture adjustments.  It's a keeper.

This was a great product.  55 channels from an inner room on the 8th floor in a pre-war building in Midtown NYC (i.e. I wasn't even trying to maximize the antenna location--good enough for me).  Quite impressive!!!  Super fast delivery.  Simple installation-10 minutes max, including channel scan.  "Magic sticker" allow me to attach to the backside of the TV.  Watching all major NYC local stations, and many more non-major stations.  No complaints from me.  Buy recommend.

I live in North Suburbs of Atlanta. The 4 major networks antennas are 21 to 32 miles from my house. I have an 65 inchLG OLED TV. I connected the external amplifier and USB power cable to the back of the TV. the connection was very simple.

Read multiple reviews of highly satisfied customers. I ran a couple scans basically on the same wall just 7 feet apart. I prefer to have it in a window but for me and the location of the TV it seems to work better hanging over a chair in the living room. Could be its getting its signal from the opposite direction but I live 30 minutes west of Wash DC so I was aiming it that way. I will say I did pick up some additional channels but not several extras and I'd say the 200 mile radius thing is not even possible. Could be because of clear view or not. I am using it on the 2nd floor. I took my old antenna up to the 3rd floor and it picks up the same channels that the new one picks up that I could not pick up before on the 2nd level. Overall its worth it to me. Whatever channels you do pick up have wonder clarity and definition. Beats the prices of cable, etc.

I ordered one of these to try on a new 32" Led TV that I bought to use as a PC monitor, thinking that if it doesn't work I wasn't really planning to use it for watching TV anyway.This is far enough away in the house that I had to add a 20' coax extension to the provided coax cable.  It works perfectly! I was getting more channels on it than we do on the two sets we actually use for watching TV.

I have been using cable for the past 3-4 years and the price only increases for the same services.  It's like doing an annual dance with my ISP/Cable provider that adds services I don't want or need for a (temporarily) lower price... at least until "the deal" expires.  No more.  Recently, I have used more streaming services and less TV, but would miss the local channels if I canceled my cable TV altogether.  After some experimenting with location and settling on an outside facing window, the amplified HD antenna allows me to get 30 channels over the air, with very few reception issues.  I am very happy with my purchase, as it will allow me to save over $40 a month.  Well worth the purchase price!

Yea, this thing is weak. Maybe if I covered my house with tinfoil I might get a better signal. I tried all of the methods and nothing seemed to work. I bought another model and within 30 seconds I have over 60 over the air channels.Hopefully I can sell this one to some sucker at a garage sale for $2

This was all new to me. I just wanted to put an old TV in the garage without running cable wire from the basement or getting another cable box.  I am more than pleased to have around 50+ channels, including local stations from Detroit and Toledo, the latter being 35 miles away. Who knew??  I am going to try it in the house and maybe cut cable completely and just get internet service.

This maybe the best antenna of this type, but this review is just a caution. The coverage maps do not consider interference from local geography. I should get lots of channels in the Washington DC area, BUT I am located in a river valley with a steep cliff between my house and the TV signals. So my coverage is spotty at best. It was a small investment to find out, so don't be disappointed. Many of the channels I do get are shopping channels or foreign language.

Great product.  I have recently cut the cable bill and went to a streaming only.  For awhile I tried live TV streaming services but none of them seamed to be worth the money.  Especially since I only really watched local channels. Finally I cut the cable with them and mounted this antenna.  Extremely easy set up and has the few channels I ever watched and paid for... and now it's free!  I wish I realized antenna TV was still a thing a long time ago.  I honestly had no idea that broadcast TV was still around.

I purchased this antenna from Amazon.com and I must say I am very impressed.  The installation and set-up were very easy and the product worked exactly as described.  Including the four sticky tabs for mounting the antenna to the window was an excellent idea and made the installation clean and simple.  From my media room I am able to receive forty-five channels free of charge over the air and with great reception.  I will definitely be recommending this antenna to my friends and family.  My only comment would be that I wish the coaxial cable that connects the HDTV antenna to the television was one meter longer than it is.Great product, thank you!!!

I recently purchased these HDTV antennas because we decided to finally "cut the cord" with a bit of apprehension. We had actually put off doing this for a few years because we didn't understand HOW the antenna part worked.We finally did it and now are saying "why didn't we do this sooner?!" The antennas were very easy to install and they work great.

We recently cut the cable and started streaming content, but missed the local channels. When football season came around I searched for streaming of NFL games and discovered that I needed two streaming services that were almost as much as the cable bill. I researched the other options and found that since the games we watch are just for the local team we could just use an antenna. this one had good reviews and was available immediately so I ordered it and got it the next day. Had it installed and operating in less than 10 minutes. Great picture too!

This antenna has been great!  We love it for watching the local news and local channels.  One of the best features, is when the internet goes out, we can still stay abreast to what's going on, or have some form of entertainment.  Highly recommend!

This is one amazing antenna.  We moved from a larger city to a rural community and quickly found out cable service was lacking.  This antenna provides all of our local channels and the picture quality is clear just like cable. My wife said, “You saved our marriage!”  We strongly recommend this to anyone wanting to cut the cord to high priced cable service providers.

The product is very well packaged and all items were identified in the instructions clearly.  There were written instructions as well as diagrams to follow.  The process was fairly simple - I do have an HDTV that had a USB port so I did not need to use the adapter plug.  It took me a while to find where to change the source on my TV but once I found it I was able to scan for channels.  I am able to get NBC, CBS, PBS, and approximately 25 other stations.  This Antenna is being used on a TV in my office where I do not have a cable outlet and did not want to have to pay for another cable box.  The picture is very good, the sound is good and I can move the Antenna anywhere else I may want to put the TV.

I purchased your Gesobyte Amplified HDTV antenna from Amazon. It arrived around 630pm on 9/8/20. By 7pm, I was scanning for digital channels in Phoenix, AZ. It was very easy to mount the antenna (I did it above the TV) and connect it to the television. When the TV finished scanning for channels, I was able to access 79 digital channels including all the major networks. I am in the process of purchasing another antenna for my playroom television. This is a superb product that I would recommend to everyone

All I can say is WOW!!! The ease of installation, the price AND the amount of channels we receive is amazing! My mother in law asked me what antenna she should get and I suggested the amazon best seller that included prime (just in case we weren't happy with it). But no need for return! She ordered another one and then I ordered on for my husband and I. Thank you so much for creating a slim-line, easy to install, affordable and effective product!

My friend bought this for me. I really like it.  I get a lot of channels and the picture is super clear.  I am thinking of getting another one for my bedroom once I get a TV for the room.  NO I will be getting another one!!  I was hesitant to go to Antenna TV but I am now glad I did.  No more cable for me!  I am saving money and still get to watch my favorite stations.  LOVE this product. Will recommend to my friends and family

So this product works great if you have it in the right position. I bought this for a TV in an upstairs bedroom.I tried to place the antenna near a window. I got 2-3 channels and they would drop out. Was going to return the product.

Recently finished setting up my HDTV Antenna and WOW!  I purchased this type of antenna several years ago and the results were not good.  My primary viewing interest was reception of the local networks and I got much more.  I have lots of channels.  Very impressed with this product and glad I made the purchase.  Thank You HDTV Antenna.

We recently purchased this latest 2020 amplied HD digital TV antenna for our second home because we didn't want to subscribe to cable or satellite because of the cost for only approximately 4 months out of the year. This antenna was very easy to connect and works wonderfully in the Mesa, AZ area. We highly recommend this antenna and have referred it to several friends and relatives. We receive local channels and many, many more channels at no cost!

This product is awesome.  I was nervous after reading some reviews but so happy I bought it anyway.  Let me say that I don’t have towers close to me.  There are trees in my backyard in the direction of the towers.  I installed this in my basement (with no walkout) in between floor joists and behind insulation.  If this was outside it would be at ground level.  I had little expectations.  I connected it to my tv and did a scan.  Boom, 41 channels.  Ordered a tablo dvr and can’t wait for it to come in and use this antenna with it.  If you need an antenna look no further.

This is the fifth or sixth HD antenna I have had, and it is the first in which I can put it in one spot and forget it. All the others, I'd have to move depending upon channel. Even at one bar, the reception is great. Not sure why this works better than the others but it does. dxhc189

So actually wanted to share my experience. Been using a ClearTV Model X-71 for years, and have always struggled to get channels.Friends would have to sit perfectly still in the room so the picture wouldn’t break up mid-play.

Just received my boosted HDTV antenna today. I had just finished installing a 58” Samsung Smart TV in my bedroom, and had it hooked up to a ROKU Stick and another Boosted Indoor antenna that guaranteed to bring in local channels from  80 + miles. When I scanned the Air antenna channels I received Four Crystal Clear Local Channels. I then disconnected the unit and hooked up the Must Have USA antenna and re-scanned.  The Must Have USA antenna immediately locked In Sixteen Crystal Clear Local Channels. I couldn’t be happier about this product, I will now definitely cut the Cable Bill, as I have all the Local Channels I would have missed out on.Thank You so much for your fine product.

I literally was afraid of installing the antenna for fear that it would be hard and frustrating. Once I decided to go ahead, NO REGRETS! The installation took about 10 minutes and I was VERY pleasantly surprised at the great picture I was getting. I was able to get national channels that come through cable! Definitely recommend this product.

Just want to share that I love this HDTV antenna.  I'm now working from home due to COVID-19 and ordered this antenna to be able to watch the news and updates on the virus. Prime delivery in 2 days!The antenna was easy to set up and it worked right away with clear picture quality. Great product!!

This does not work no matter where I put it and no matter how many times I scan for channels, day or night. Oh, it finds plenty of channels, but none of them can be viewed. I live in a large city, less than 5 miles from any broadcast tower. So disappointing.

I just received my new HDTV antenna this morning.  I was so excited to get it set up and was able to do so in minutes.  The instructions say that you may need to put the antenna on a window... that wouldn't work where my tv was located so I put it on the wall of my tv console.  It still works perfectly!  It is out of sight and not taking up space on the table top.  Now I have beautiful HD quality TV local channels (plus more) that I can watch for free!  This is great!

We just finished the process of “cutting the cord” with our satellite company. I ended up buying the “U MUST HAVE” Ultra-thin HDTV Antenna from Amazon. I’ll tell you that it lived up to its name because this antenna is a “Must have”. Install in less than five minutes and the antenna pulled in over forty channels. I do not like cables showing so I positioned the antenna behind our living room tv. I plugged the usb into the USB port on the back of my tv to power the antenna (it also comes with a power plug). Very, very easy to install.  Great picture for not only my local channels but many more as well. Highly recommend this product.

I recently purchased your Ultra-Thin HDTV antenna from amazon and I could not be more pleased with my decision.  I can see why it was labeled Amazon Bestseller!In my bedroom i had an antenna --did not want more cable cost--and it worked so-so at best.  While it did pick up channels they were always going in and out and not clear by any stretch.

Have been dealing with a 2 year old HD ran a channel scan indoor antenna that was causing complaints from my family. We were missing 3 HD TV Broadcast channels that we had been able to get. Received the new HDTV indoor antenna and had it installed in minutes. Very happy family!

I have never owned an HD antenna and recently cut the cord on my cable service. I wanted to have the ability to watch sports broadcast on local channels so I turned to your product. When the box arrived I was surprised at the small size and relatively simple design. I must say I had my doubts on how well this thing would work to give me clear HD channels. I must say I was blown away at the picture quality and I can’t imagine how much easier setup could have been. Thank you so much for an affordable, simple product that makes my decision to cancel cable even more solidified!!!!

I have tried a couple of other antennas in the past but this one is a keeper for me.  "It works" for me and fulfills my expectations.  And I'd like to mention I am a long way from any major city and I am happy with the reception I am getting.  This is the best one yet and I do recommend it.  John Martin in North Carolina

We have been held prisoner by Xfinity for years and are finally free.  Every time we would call Comcast to cancel cable and make it internet only (with the idea of buying a digital antenna instead), they would tell us our monthly bill would go UP if we did this-- which makes absolutely no sense... except to their stockholders.  This last time I really let the supervisor have it, because the customer service person had just told me the what "internet only" monthly bill would be for a new customer-- without realizing I was an existing customer.  Anyway, we are finally free and super-happy with the new antenna!  The picture is superior to the cable picture and we get almost every channel we watched anyway.

We cut the cable in January 2020 to save money and ordered the HDTV Antenna from Amazon.We should have done this sooner! Picture quality is just as good as cable, friends over for a football game didn't believe it was antenna. We get all the local live channels for free, with cable some networks are "working out" their agreement so we lose the channel while they are in negotiations. This won't happen with the antenna!

I have owned a few of the hd antennas, Iw will say that this one with the 4k option really does offer the advantaged picture.  The extended cable was a nice fit for how I installed my antenna.  The hdmi use is a great feature also! I would highly recommend  this version to anyone doubting the quality of others!

My experience with the HDTV Antenna has been better than any indoor antenna I have ever tried. There is only one channel I am not receiving. Otherwise, it is the clearest picture and most consistent, without interruptions, I have ever had. The value is definitely there and now my friend wants the free one for himself to get rid of his current antenna. He had been thinking about an outdoor antenna but they are expensive. This is a great alternative and with hurricane season coming up a safer investment. who wants to put a new antenna on there roof just to have it torn down in a storm. The other thing is if you move, it moves with you easily.

We’ve been fortunate to stay home and together when the COVID19 pandemic started effecting our lives. We wanted to watch a little TV & keep up with local & national news but didn’t have cable or WiFi. A neighbor suggested an antenna might be the solution to our problem. I ordered your Ultra-thin HDTV Antenna from Amazon. It arrived in great condition & on time. The instructions are easy to follow and setup was easier than expected too. It only took about 30 minutes. Our home is on one level, so high on the wall above a window turned out to be the best placement for our area.Now our non-smart tv w/built-in dvd, gets 25 channels without the amplifier. We’re set!

I have tried many different antennae’s but I found this one to be the best. It came as promised and was very easy to hook up and set. The pictures are very clear and it gets all of my channels without having to move the antennae. I have this one on my lanai so I can watch tv and exercise. I intend to get a second one.

I ordered the antennae for our travel trailer when we are camping. However, we are also setting up our camper as an emergency COVID-19 quarantine location for family members (just in case). Upon setting up the antenna, we received double the channels as using the internal TV antenna. It seems the reception is much clearer as well. We hung the antenna from the window so it can be removed easily during travel. See image attached. Very pleased so far.

Update: After completing a review for my still very honest opinion below, I was sent a free antenna that was much different than the one I purchased. This one has a red "U Must Have" printed on it and it surprisingly brings in more channels.  Also unlike the one that I purchased, this free antenna is black on both sides making in more sightly in the window rather than a big white back (the side with the adhesives are on the white side)! I am returning this one that I purchased  below but has already purchased another antenna from Amazon that is listed as #1 in Antennas and it has the "U Must Have" on it.Hello,

I received my antenna and it works great! I have bought 2 other brands that would pick up channels, but would break up when trying to watch a show. This works just like watching cable, except the picture is even better. I live in the country and can get 25 channels clearly. The installation is very easy and took under a minute.

We purchased our HDTV Antenna after cutting our cable and it works really well.  Installation is quick and painless.  The antenna cord is quite long and looks like it can be extended by adding more coaxial cable.  Hiding it was tricky against white walls and baseboards.  We tried a few positions for the flat antenna, but given our TV's location in the house, ended up leaving it flat on the media center.  It takes some trial an error to find a good window or wall to mount the antenna to get the most amount of stations.  The HD picture and sound is great, definitely recommended for getting national and local news and network TV programming.

I am happy to share my experience with your HD TV antenna. We have had it hooked up to our smart TV for over a month and are very happy with our reception. We have been able to cancel our cable subscription and still get our network shows plus more. We feel confident in recommending your product to anyone looking to break away from Cable.

My most recent experience with a TV antenna dated back 10 years ago and it was not pleasant. Recently I'm thinking of switching from cable  tv to Sling, which doesn't have local tv. so I decided to try this hdtv antenna. Ordered it two days ago. Received it today. It was really easy to install and the channel searching was quickly completed. To my surprise, I got 22 local channels, most of them I never knew existed. I tried couple spots for the antenna. Ended with a place near a window. Image quality is very good. I'm glad that I bought this.

This is the second antenna I purchased, the first one worked perfectly on my Samsung,  not a smart TV. The most recent purchase was for a Samsung smart TV but the HDMI cable was different on the TV and the connection from the antenna did not fit. I had to return it. I wish the manufacturer would let the consumer know that it is not a universal hook up.

I was skeptical of this new style antenna.  Have always used rabbit ears but they keep getting broken.  I live on a ridge at a higher elevation with no obstructions.  Pulls in Baltimore stations 38 miles away and Washington 43 miles away.  Doesn't look like much when you open the box, but I'm happy.  It was easy to connect.  Just hung it on the curtain rod.  Then used my TV remote to scan for channels.  I am picking up about 60 channels.  Many are duplicates though between the two markets.  And shopping channels....who watches those?

I paid too much for the model not as described on the amazon description. it says 18 ft of coax cable on the description  but it is only actually 13 ft. Wont reach my window. bad advertisement. see pictures. i could have paid a lower price if i ordered coax cable at a shorter length.  This product is misleading customers of actual description of item when you receive it.  Waste of my time and effort.

From Sarasota, FloridaI was very excited to receive a gift of this product from my sister. She did a lot of research on this and your product stood out!  Tips from reviewers were most helpful. This was very easy to install. I used packing tape to apply the unit to my clean window! I also tried moving unit as per instructions and also checked short vs long range capacity. Reception was excellent for channels received.

I received my HDTV antenna on 2/4/20, it was very easy to set up with my Sony TV. I had cancelled my regular cable TV subscription service and was looking for a way to get free local TV channels without paying for cable subscription. This works perfectly out of the Box and i just placed it hidden behind my TV but has windows nearby. The quality of the video is really good and see HD quality, was able to receive all the local channels and a bit more. I am glad that I made one time purchase on this and works flawlessly without any reception issues.

I just installed my new HDTV antenna which took all of about five minutes. Immediately I went from having next to no channels at all to having nearly 50 channels many of which were digital. The quality and the reception is excellent and looks just like it would if it were satellite or cable. I did need to use my own heavy duty double-sided tape to keep it on the drywall, but that's not worth any deduction. I’m very pleased with the quality of this product and how easily it was to install.

I went to streaming services some tim ago as cable prices are ridiculous.With the new pandemic I could only get national news.  A friend recommended your antenna and I couldn’t be happier.  I’m reconnected to my community during these difficult times.

My Amplified HD Digital TV Antenna Long 120 Miles Range was easy to install.  I had it connected and working within 20 minutes.  I was able to receive two local channels immediately, regardless of antenna position.  The third one, a CBS broadcaster 60 miles away, I can get by placing the antenna in front of a window and tilting it toward the sky. Internet service is generally poor in my neighborhood.  I use the local cable provider for internet access, and the image I get through my ROKU is not as crisp as the image I get through the antenna.  I can get 20 or 30 channels through the antenna, depending on position.

A little note pricy than similar products but works better .  Bought some similar cheaper products but didn’t work as well as this one.  Need to install 6 inches at least away from tv and walls and about 4 ft high .

I had ordered 3 other antennas from a different company that were strongly recommended. They wouldn't pick up the 3 main stations no matter where I put them. Unfortunately it was after my return window so I'm stuck with them. I'm trying not to go back to cable because it's so expensive. So I looked for a different one and chose this one! It's easy to hook up, came with instructions, push pins to attach it to the wall to figure out the best location! I now receive the 3 main stations plus several more that I didn't know existed! I'm so excited! The price was affordable even on a fixed income. I don't ever see myself going back to cable!

I am sharing my wonderful experience with your antennae.  I purchased your product on amazon due to the high number of positive reviews and desperate need to replace a previous product Granny’s Home Digital HDTV smart indoor antennae which only got one channel and then developed water inside of it due to a design flaw that allowed condensation to build inside of it.  Once your product was easily mounted and hooked up I scanned for channels and received all of the main basic channels and then some without any static or further problems.

We recently purchased your HDTV Antenna after our satellite carrier lost its contract to transmit a local television channel.  We purchased your antenna so we could watch the Superbowl and  local programming.The instruction were good and I had no trouble hooking up the antenna to my television, actually it was quite easy.  Since then we were able to watch the football game and subsequent shows.

Antenna was very easy to install and program. I was able to receive 4 HD channels. I live in a very rural area and was pleasantly surprised to receive any channels at all on an indoor antenna. Would definitely recommend this antenna to anyone who is looking for an HD Indoor antenna.

Setup was incredibly easy. I paired my antenna with a Tablo DVR and initially ran into an issue picking up channels during the Tablo scan, however this ended up being a Tablo related issue and not an antenna issue. I'm very pleased with the number of channels the antenna was able to pick up, as well as the quality of the video/audio. The antenna does need to be very close to a window -- I was hoping I could keep it hidden, but the video gets too choppy.Wish I knew about these HDTV antennas and made the switch from cable years ago.

We just "cut the cord" on our cable, but still wanted access to view network television and purchased your product.  I can't get over how easy the set up was to get up and running.  I own a smart tv with a built-in receiver, so I needed nothing but the antenna and the tv to get 48 more channels!  Majority of the reception is crystal clear and many are in HD.  The signal amplifier is incredible at boosting the reception to full signal strength in most of the channels.  Last time I used an antenna on a tv (many moons ago), I remember turning the rabbit ears around and around to try to get something other than a fuzzy signal.  This is a tremendous upgrade and it makes my decision to cut the cord an excellent one.  Thanks for this great product and I will be recommending it to friends

I was fearful about cutting the cable because you can get a lot of shows streaming, but I like live TV.  This antenna was super easy to install.  Great reception.  If the weather is really poor, the connection can come and go.  But nothing is perfect.  90% of the time I have no complaint.

Test product absolutely does not work. I left 20 miles from broadcast station and cannot receive any stations with this antenna. I contacted the company and they said I needed a hundred and fifty mile unit I did not realize the unit is supposed to be good for 120 miles. Said they refunded my money but I have not seen it

Hi, I received my HDTV antenna this week. I moved a LED TV to a location without cable TV and wanted to see the quality of the picture using this HDTV antenna. WOW, the picture is perfect and I picked up about 40 free HDTV channels in Chicago suburb area.Thanks for a great product that saves money!

This product works better than I had expected it to work. The picture quality is just as good as cable. We are glad we cut our cable and bought this digital antenna. We will no longer have to wait in order to watch local channels if we ever move!! This is one of the best investments we have made.

This was easy to put up straight out of the box. The long cord made it easy to stick it to my window and hide the cord on the way to the TV. The stickies in the kit are large and effective; another antenna I purchased a few years ago had tiny stickies that didn't work very well and I had to supply my own double sided tape. I did not have that problem here. I live in a major city so I have a lot of clear channels available and they come through clear and without interruption.

Our tape measure must be broken... The 18' cable included only measures 10'.We've been putzing with this for at least 1/2 hour and do have some channels with nice clear pictures - IF - one of us holds the black pad close to the outer wall near a window. Obviously that is not a permanent option.

Ordered my antenna through Amazon.  The description seemed accurate.  Very easy to install. One step I missed initially was turning the switch ‘on’.  Could ship the unit with the switch in the on position.  I got zero channels to come up first time.  Unit really does make pictures appear sharper and sound seems better.  Happy with the product.E. Cathers

This was a great addition after eliminating cable. We get 25 channels all local and it’s just what we wanted with most the price tag. We live in a mountainous region so I’m not surprised we didn’t get a TON of channels but I’m happy with what we got, install was very easy.

I have two of these antennas. I have had one for about a year and just recently ordered another one. They are very reasonably priced, easy to install, have great reception, clear picture quality, and can easily be hidden so that they don't take away from your room decor. I would highly recommend these to others.

When I first purchased this, I was a little worried about missing out on a lot of TV.  Since installing it, I realized that I don't watch regular TV that much anyways.  The nice this about this antenna is that I found that I have a lot of digital channels that are already on my TV.  The amount and quality of channels are all dependent on your local area and signal, so be sure to check before purchasing.

This antenna is great!  Reception is great and I love that it is so light that we can move it around as needed.  We often watch a smart tv outside and this antenna enables us to get local channels without having to deal with moving a cable box.  Love free free free channels.

I probably have one of the most complex home systems in the US. I have 10 TV's (one outside). I use  a COAX-Mixer (input/output on all ports).  I also use the VeCOAX HDMI to Coax prior to the distribution of the Dish stuff. I feed the ten TV's and have three inputs on the mixer. One input is a Dish Hopper, one input is a Dish Joey, the third is the antenna input. This antenna has provided the best reception (yes is is on the second level with metal exterior siding). I have both strong and week signals in my area. The booster doesn't reduce the strong too much but assists the weaker signals. I would recommend this product.Mark

This antenna is great. It was very easy to set up and install. I had tried a couple of other antennas but would only get a couple of my local stations. The first time after installing this antenna and scanned my stations it brought up a whole lot more than the other antennas did. Now i get all my local stations and everyone is crystal clear. And so many other stations also. I just wish i had purchased this one to start with. I love the longer cord to place it where you need to have it get the best reception. And i only had to move it once. I love mine. So if you are thinking about cutting the cord, this is the antenna for you for your local stations and so much more.
Doesn’t  work at all, I live fairly  close to the tv towers yet it wouldn’t even bring in a stations. Total waste of money, a cheap outside coat hanger would do just as well.

Thanks to the HDTV ANTENNA I can now watch my shows and other programs . Hate when it rains and the cable gives out but not no more. All I need to do now is switch over to antenna and my programs are right there , It's not knocked out my storms . Was an easy set up . Enjoying my new found toy and what if has to offer .

I was forced to cut cable and I was so sad to lose my favorite shows. After about 3 months, I complained to a friend and she told me how I could get an antenna and get some basic channels. I found this one to have the best reviews AND it was affordable. It was SO easy to setup and the picture looks no different than what I had with cable. I also get way moer channels than the 3 or 4 basic channels that I was expecting. This is such an awesome alternative to cable!!

I received my Gesobyte antenna today. I connected it in minutes, scanned and was able to receive 11 channels! This was a wonderful surprise since we are in a rural area. Our cable service is out now due to hurricane Laura so catching live tv couldn’t come at a better time!

I purchased the HDTV Antenna for my mother. She was only using a fire stick because she is older and couldn’t afford cable. She was so happy to get her local channels back.During this time when she is stuck at home, this gives her more options and more local news to watch. You made an old lady and her daughter very happy.

I live 12 miles from Pittsburgh up on a hill so you would think this product would have done a better job than the homemade antenna I was using.  Prior to this purchase I was using a two foot coax cable stripped down to just the center copper cable except for a couple inches at the coax nut.  Sadly this product offers no improvement over the Coax wire I was using prior to the purchase of [LATEST 2020] Amplified HD Digital TV Antenna Long.

I have tried 4 different kinds of antennas and amplifiers. The last one I had was bringing in 15 channels (and i had it connected to an amplifier) and when I put this one in the same location it brings in 49 channels. I am really pleased. I was amazed. It must have some good amplifier circuit or something. My other antenna and amplifier would get blips of other channels but nothing enough to keep the channel. This antenna gave 2 bars of signal on the same channels.

I recently purchased 4 of your HDTV Antennas for our home after we decided to cut the cord.  I carefully read all the reviews on Amazon and decided up on your product.  We were SO happy with these.  They are VERY easy to install, have great picture quality and so many channels to choose from.  Great product for an amazing price.

Ordered the Amplified Digital TV. Never needed the amplifier. Installed for a garage TV that I wanted to watch football on local channels. Brought in all local channels, plus some others that I didn’t expect. Picture is great! Easy to install, but make sure that you have your TV re-scan channels so it works perfectly.

We recently had enough with Xfinity and cut our cable at our house. We love this HDTV antenna and would recommend it to everyone looking to cut out their cable bill!

I am very happy I purchased the Digital HDTV Antenna, we were so unhappy with the rising prices of cable then resorted to AT&T streaming and saw the prices up to beginner prices of cable.  I hooked it up 10 minutes after receiving and I am so happy now all I need is a DVR.  My husband is in his glory with all the old programs he grew up with.Now I am confident that in the streaming services will we canceled.

I recently purchased your product through amazon as my old antenna was not picking up some of the local channel when I moved to a new location. I couldn't  even get ndc abc and fox channel. I tried scanning and scanning and was only able to pick up 34 channels so I decided to look for a new antenna. Upon stumbling onto your product on amazon and looking through the review, I decided to try your product. Once I got your product and did the scan, I was able to get over 100 channel (132 channels). It was very easy to set up (plug and tv scan). I was able to watch the local channel and the picture quality was very clear and crisp. I would get your product again and recommend to friends and family.

When I first got it I only got about 9 channels, but I was willing to live with that.  Now, a few months later - I only get 1 channel, Fox.  I do not live that far away from town either.  The only thing I really wanted was NBC.  This product is horrible - buy from some place else!  Definitely a waste of money.

I live in a pretty rural area where it is almost impossible to get any sort of cable except for satellite. I purchased an HDTV antenna from Target for almost double the price of this one and returned it to days later. I was only able to get 1 full channel with it. I found THIS HDTV Antenna on amazon and figured I would give it a shot. I am pleased so far with the performance. Like I said, I live in a pretty rural area so I haven't had as much luck as everyone else receiving 50+ channels but I was able to get a few with it's signal! For the price point and reliability of the product it would be silly not to purchase this if you are in the market for an HDTV Antenna!

I purchased this item after trying 3 other antennas.  2 of those were interior and 1 was exterior.  The two interior antennas only brought in a few channels.  Our most popular channels here are ABC, Fox, NBC and CBS.  Neither of these could receive all 4 of there.  The exterior antenna brought in all 4, but is kinda hideous looking on the house and requires the bulky co-ax cable.Now this HDTV Antenna loses the enormous amount of bulky co-ax cable and requires no drilling in the exterior wall.  In addition to the major 4 channels in Baton Rouge, it also brought in the Lafayette and New Orleans affiliates along with other channels - for a total of 34 channels being received!

I've been without a cable package for years, granted I have Netflix, Hulu, Prime, Disney+, ESPN, and a few others so it hasn't been an issue. But I was missing my local news. My local talk shows. Those things you'd wake up to as a child and didn't care at all to actually pay attention to, but the background noise was comfort. Mostly I wanted to just see if it worked and guess what? It does! Plugged that baby in and instant channels. I can now watch Jerry Springer while working from home. Definitely worth the few dollars it costs.

I have tried these “free” local channel devices from three sources. This one is the best. Very high quality. Reception is great. The price is reasonable. I  can recommend this product without hesitation. As with all these devices they do work best when near a window.

Very simple to install.  Didn't think I could do it myself but I did.  Only thing didn't like was the short range long range light.  Doesn't say which one the light is going to.  It's on greenbut I don't know if it is long or short range.Fast shipping too

I recently bought this antenna for my mother. She doesn’t like the bells and whistles of cable but she does enjoy watching the local news at 5 and 10.
