NOT ANYMORE! This antenna has been smooth sailing for the past few weeks and I stopped getting phone calls from my mother that included a ten-minute rant about her news programs. It has been very helpful. I would recommend this to anyone. Thank you!

This product works great for me! I had been using another indoor antenna that was working great for a short period and then started losing reception while watching tv. It was getting really annoying and decided to try another indoor antenna just to see if it was maybe because I live near mountains. When this one came in I plugged it right in and it gets every channel and has not lost reception for 1 second! I was getting ready to reconnect cable service or get an outdoor antenna. Glad I didn’t lose hope!

I am extremely pleased with this product. I was hesitant about purchasing this as I really did not have a window that was assessable to mount it on. I placed it as high as the cord would allow and the reception is incredible! It was a little trial and error but after finding the correct television input slot everything went smoothly.The only downfall is if the weather is quite cloudy the picture breaks up on some of the channels where the towers are furthest away.

We have had the old style rabbit ear antenna for years in our guest room. Due to both of us working in the medical field we are having to self quarantine at home. Meaning one of us was getting the basic 5 channels with the old antenna. Decided to purchase the extra.hdtv antenna and upgrade our selection. It was so worth the purchase. Getting extra channels is such a nice perk. Thank you!

5 stars all around. Incredibly easy setup. Excellent reception,  I'm pulling in around 60 channels OTA in the Orlando area. Excellent picture and audio quality from said channels. This is the only indoor antenna I've tried that actually gave me usable results.  This thing is excellent and I would highly recommend it for anyone looking to cut the cord.

We cut the cord on cable, and moved to your antenna. We live in Iowa, and while we do not have many channels, the closest towers were quite a distance from us. I love how lightweight this antenna is, and how well it works. We had purchased one at our local store that was heavy and inefficient.

Omg! My big antenna in the attic couldn't pull in channels.  But this little thing placed in my window pulls in stations from about 40 miles away! Looks like the picture is about 720, but I don't care.  I'm saving $15 per month over my cable provider.

This has a long range short range switch on it. I thought it was a joke but it really makes a difference. Picture quality is better than two other antennas I have. Compared to the one I am replacing, there’s no comparison. Price is great too.

The ease of set up is about two minutes then its plug and play.  I went from 6 channels to about 38.  If some channels don't come in adjust your antenna and rescan your tv for channels and grab the popcorn......just wanted to update their stock picture is not what I received but the picture I attached and it work great.

We recently cut the cord for cable, but with the NFL season upon us I had no way to watch my Dallas Cowboys in action.  After researching options I decided to try a HD antenna for the first time.  I looked at several different brands on Amazon before settling with the Gesobyte HD antenna due to price and reviews. Once received, it was easy to install.  It took some adjusting to find the right spot for the antenna but I must say that I am extremely happy with the purchase.  The NFL games come in crystal clear with no signs of screen tearing.

I would absolutely recommend this antenna. It took me less than 10 minutes to set up and scan channels. In my area, I have about 20 channels and the picture quality is excellent. I will be purchasing another for a tv in my spare room. It's also saving me $100/month to not have cable anymore!

We love this Gesobyte digital antenna. I recently purchased it through Amazon and I’m very happy with it. I am able to get over 40 digital channels. All my local channels that I really wanted and many others that I didn’t expect . Superb quality and high definition. I have recommended it to all of my friends who are looking to cut the cable and stop paying these outrageous prices.This is all you need and it’s so much less expensive than subscriptions..

I bought three different indoor antennas trying to find which one would work best. One was the same price as this one and the other was $70 more expensive. This one definitely gave me the best reception and the most channels, so I sent the other two back!  It is super easy to install and it is giving me excellent reception. I am very pleased with the quality of the picture; so much better than cable. Excellent in all ways.

Over the years I have bought several digital antennas and this is the best for several reasons.  Size, amplifier that actually works and two sided color on antenna “pad” to allow it to better blend in surrounding.I am probably going to buy a second one for another room that I don’t have cable/satellite currently.

I lost so many channels, thought it was the weather or something - then I thought heck, maybe it's this old TV antenna that I got a few years back - figured I"d try this one and I'm amazed - ALL those channels I couldn't get - I GOT EM BACK!  It's awesome!

After dwindling down to mostly just watching local network. stations, we decided to discontinue our cable service for now until we decide on a permanent configuration for watching all content.  In the meantime, this antenna is the PERFECT solution to pull in the networks and many other fun channels to watch---for FREE!!!Set-up only took about 10 minutes and we were amazed that we had TV again!!!

Good evening, on receiving our antenna we hooked it up immediately to our TV. We got excellent reception. We are not able to get all our locan channels which is interesting but has been an issue no matter what type of antenna we have used. We love it because it is so clear, much better than any other we have used. We love the 18 foot cord. We do wish there were a better way to attach it to the wall. Small hooks or something like that would be better. The sticky tabs don't last very long at all. Overall it is a great product and we are very satisfied. Thank you

This is a pretty good antenna. It has a long range due to the length of the cable attached to the antenna. Many have short cables or attach directly to the back of the tv which limits your ability to place the antenna. The long cord on this one allows you to move the antenna around to find the best location for you. And for the price, you’re not going to do much better than this one.

I first tried the antenna on a television I had on the first floor and then on the second floor.  I live between 35 and 45 miles away from the transmitters in my area.  On the first floor I was able to receive 12 channels pretty regularly and occasionally 16.  On the second floor I was able to receive over 30.  It does a nice job and was easy to install.

I am very pleased with the reception, no freezing or loss of signal with this antenna.The only improvement I would suggest are the adhesive squares that come with the antenna. They could be a better quality. The antenna kept falling of the wall. I had to use small thumbtacks to keep my antenna on the wall.

Let's start off by saying for $30, this is worth it.Pros: For the price, the quality of picture is about what you would expect. Definitely not 4K as advertised but still very clear 720p and most 1080p. I actually received more channels than I initially thought I would, so thats definitely a bonus. Once placed in the correct location, the connection seems to be steady.

Installed in less than 5 minutes. Picture quality is really sharp. I was able to scan and double the number of available channels I was getting with ears (26 vs 54). I highly recommend for those looking to cut the cord.

I just finished setting up my Gesobyte amplified HD antenna and was very please with how easy it was to set up and the minimal amount of time it took to auto program the TV stations in my area. I now have access to a mix of SD and HD channels, of which all come in very clear.

We thoroughly enjoy the quality reception our Gesobyte gives us.  We get great reception with over 59+ channels in our area.  Additionally we take it with us when we go camping as it gives us better reception than the antenna that our 2019 camper came with.  We often camp off the grid and the channels the GB HDTV antenna is just amazing.Thanks for a Great Product..

Wow, I was really impressed with your antenna.  I am way down South Texas and was expecting to get 8 maybe 10 channels, to my surprise I got 22.  No they are not repeated.  Thank you sooo much.  I will definitely recommend this product to my friends.  I will  kick my Cable bill goodbye forever.

I bought one of your antennas from Amazon.com.  I have gone through 3 antennas, and yours was reasonably priced, simple to install, and BY FAR the best results of any of my previous purchases.  We added around 25 channels and all but a few are crystal clear.  I live 20 miles or so west of downtown Chicago.  Thanks for the great product! Never pay high cable bills again....This antenna is simply the best.  I can get all of my local channels.  Easy to install.  What a great price!  I wasn't sure how this was going to work.This was very easy to set up.  If you're tired of high cable bills, this is the way to go!!
I live within 20 miles of the broadcast towers.  I followed all instructions and tried various locations.  Alas, my rabbit ear antenna far out performed it.

We said bye-bye to high cable bills and went with another provider for internet only. Got a HDTV but we really liked our local news, PBS stations, Me TV, the CW, etc. Bought this HDTV antennae and couldn't be happier! We always get about 40 stations easily with 5 bar reception and sometimes I do the re-scan to  get a few different ones. We put it on the wall instead of the window but it works well either way.Great value and quality-you won't be sorry.

Works great, got lots of free channels.  I had trouble initially because the instructions that came with it and also ones I found online did not work w my Samsung Smart TV.  The TV did not see the antenna when I went to source or any of the settings.  I finally contacted Samsung through a support chat and the tech did a great job of getting me connected with his remote tool.  Every TV has different settings, so if you have issues, just contact the manufacturer directly.

Exceeds number of channels available vs cable.  Some channels are HD, most others are very good.  Range is excellent, set it up in front of the window if you can.  Extremely easy to set up and attach to your tv.  Will save you lots of cash if replacing basic cable tv.

I ordered this antenna and received it on June 1st. It took me less than 5 minutes to hook up and another ten minutes to dial it in on my TV. I immediately began to watch a very clear picture of our local TV stations and discovered there were 49 different free channels to watch. I’m very happy with this antenna and encourage you to purchase one. You won’t he sorry.

Good morning,  I bought one of these antennas in February through Amazon and was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the picture and the many channels I received.  However, I wish there had been more instruction with it other than setting it up.  I don't seem to be able to use the number keypad , only the up,down,side to side to change channels.In the box was a offer for a extra antenna at "EXTRA. HDTV @gmail "which was not accepted so I could not send it.  If this offer for the free extra antenna is still valid, I would appreciate it being sent to me at the address on the order.

I Purchased this antenna on amazon for my TCL Roku TV. The installation was very easy, scanning of the channels was easier than expected. The image quality is truly HD and all of the channels I was hoping to receive are all available!I Highly recommend and would purchase another!
This was such a waste. I live in Queens  NY 5 Miles away from the broadcasting stations and it does not even catches that.I get more channels with out this device.

I live between two major metro areas, one is 54 miles away and the other is 53 miles.  No matter what I have tried, I cannot pick up a single TV station with this thing.  It claims 120 mile range, but I beg to differ.  Went back to the old aerial antenna as at least I can get a few stations in with that.

So, today I put up my new HDTV Antenna.I’m an air conditioning mechanic. I also invented an electronic tool that helps other mechanics to diagnose problems. Because I am also a mechanic, I get lots of compliments on the tools I designed.

Purchased this to replace antenna recommended at place I purchased my tv which did not do the job. Couldn’t get local channels. This antenna was easy to set up. Long cord to move about, although once installed I didn’t need to. Get all local channels and many more. Nice clear picture and reception on all.  Priced less than the one I am replacing, too.

We were paying for Locast for a handful of months because I didn't really know too much about external antennas. Then all my friends and neighbors started raving about them so finally we jumped on board.  I'm so glad we did.  Although we paid $30.00 for it and it's only good for our main TV, with Locast I was paying $5.00 a month which was a waste since reception wasn't even that good on it.  This antenna gets me all channels except ABC and it was easy to install and picture is very clear.  The biggest hurdle was realizing that I needed to work through the TV remote and not the Roku remote since it did not give me an "antenna" or "live TV" option.  Once I figured that out it was very simple to install!

The HD Antenna is exactly what I was looking for to "cut the cable".  It was as easy to set up as advertised.  I am so happy with my choice.  I am a 70+ year old woman and had no problem with following the directions and love the antenna.  I wish I had done this a long time ago.

I bought this to place in my fifth wheel camper. I just installed it with my flat screen TV. In an area I get three local channels I am able to receive 11 channels several of which I do not get on cable. Picture quality is clear and very good reception inside the fifth wheel. I would definitely recommend by the antenna

Had another antenna that was about $15. Was hoping I could get more stations and have better reception.Reception seems to have improved but hard to say on any given day if the extra channel I receive is clear enough to watch. Overall better than my last antenna. Long wire helps also.

I went from having 3 or 4 spotty channels to over 50 channels with strong signals. Setting up the antenna took 5 minutes. I am very satisfied with the purchase and can't wait for football season to start.

I recently purchased (2) of these HDTV Antenna’s.  I installed both of them this morning and I’m getting perfect HD quality on both TV’s.  The set up was so easy right out of the box.  In only 10 minutes, I had all of the local stations coming in perfectly.  This is a great product and I will be telling all of my friends about it.
I was very disappointed.. living in the Bay Area I thought I should be able to pick up a few stations but really hit nothing..., returned.

We purchased our HDTV Antenna ([LATEST 2020] Amplified HD Digital TV Antenna Long 120 Miles Range - Support 4K 1080p Fire tv Stick and All Older TV's Indoor Powerful HDTV Amplifier Signal Booster - 18ft Coax Cable/AC Adapter) from Amazon on May 6th and received it by May 7th!  I was able to install the antenna within minutes and attach it to our window to receive 38 free television channels including local channels.This is a great product and such easy ordering and super quick delivery!!

got my umusthaveusa antenna and opened it up and seems very easy to install, put main base against window and with 18ft of cable will reach my tv with ease. connected to tv via coaxial cable connector, then open your tv settings and scan for channels, i have 31 channels, "31 channels" so happy since cutting the cord

It is a great addition to someone that is wanting to cut their cable bill down. I went to streaming only and save a lot of money but did not have local channels. This antenna allowed me to receive local channels and the quality is the same as cable. Amazing how many channels you find too.

This has been an excellent product so far! We just received it today, and couldn’t be happier. We couldn’t receive any channels at all prior to receiving this, and now we have 25 channels! They all come in crystal clear, and the set up was a breeze.

The GESOBYTE Amplified HD Digital TV Antenna arrived in excellent condition. It was easy to assemble and install on my television. The pictures are better than the last antenna I used. I am truly happy with this purchase and will purchase again.

We purchased the HDTV antenna from Amazon and its the first brand that actually works! We live 50 miles west of Houston and have tried in vain for 3 years to find a indoor antenna that would at least pick up a couple channels - this antenna picks up 47! The installation took less than 10 minutes - simple and clear to understand. Overall just thrilled with the results - wish we would have done this much sooner!  Great product!

We recently purchased this ultra-thin HDTV antenna. The set up was as easy as plugging into the co-ax port, mounting on the wall, and running a channel scan. We now have many free HDTV channels over the air. We will probably get several more!

Instructions and pieces were easy to understand.The item is smaller/thinner than I imagined it would be (no reason lol). I am very happy with this antenna!  I just had to stick it against the window and bam! It worked immediately!

I've been really pleased with my TWO (2) HDTV antennas which were recently purchased from Amazon Nov. 11, 2019 and set up yesterday. The setup was easy but it took a few minutes to find the right place to set the antenna but (per the enclosed instructions, I was able to find the antenna power signal in my neighborhood. I was going to buy another one for a third TV so was really excited to see the offer to get a free HDTV antenna. I also used Command strips so I can move the antenna to different rooms if needed and not damage wallpaper or paint.

Immediately after unboxing my new HDTV antenna, I checked the DTV Maps website to find the nearest TV station transmission antennas. Imagine my disappointment to see there were no stations nearby. My expectations were low but I decided to give it a try anyway.Installation was quick and easy. After only a few minutes, my HDTV was scanning for free over-the-air digital channels. A couple of minutes later I was watching one of my 17 local channels in high-definition! Quick, easy, and very successful!

My husband and I bought one of the HDTV Antenna thinking that we probably would have to send it back because it wasn't going to do what was expected of the Antenna. We installed it it as directed us to and it works great. Thanks for a great product.

Bought a new hitachi tv and ordered this antenna for a covered porch. The tv picture with this antenna is absolutely stunning. It took no more than 5 minutes to hook up and the channel scan took ten minutes and we were in business. Want to get one for my garage to replace an older metal style hd antenna that does not work like the new models. They are incredible!!
This item is supposed to reach up to 120 miles?  Mobile is 54 miles away and this will not pick up FOX.  False advertising.

This was so easy to install.  I really am zero on the technology scale and I did not have any trouble disconnecting my cable and installing the HD antenna.  The picture was great.  I was amazed at how light the whole antenna was.  I am very happy with this purchase and would highly recommend it to anyone who wants to get away from cable.
I received my HDTV antenna few days ago and I am quite happy with it.I have increased my channel reception to 50% and on top the quality of the picture.

Mounting the antenna on the wall was easy and not an eye sore, after running the channel search I was very happy with the number of channels, the option to add the power amplifier or not is a good feature, I'm really happy with this antenna!

This was the superior model of two different ones I purchased at the same time.  It allowed my HDTV to pick up 38 stations in Bellevue, WA (in the signal shadow of Clyde Hill).  Previous intermittent signals are now clearly picked up, and new stations were discovered.  Installation was simple.  I taped the antenna to a basement window only one foot above ground level.  After a few false starts with other products, it was nice to find a keeper.

Super happy with our new indoor antenna! Can pick up quite a few channels (I bought it primarily to watch PBS CreateTV) and a nice surprise was also catching the Super Bowl with crystal clear reception the day we set it up.Recommending this antenna to friends and family!

130 mi Range?. This thing works exactly as would expect an antenna of this price costs. I live less than 35 miles from every over the air television station in m area and this thing picks up one of them and that is with insane positioning. Antenna is crazy flimsy, once you pick it up you will totally understand the poor quality. Do not buy this unless you live in a small apartment right on top of a tv station.
Really easy to hook up within minutes. Scanned my TV and now get 18 channels where before I only got 6.

Experience so far has been great. We set up the antenna with our TV in our media room in a walkout basement and were able to get the full suite of digital broadcast channels very quickly. Signal is strong and doesn’t seem to be interfered with by being in our basement. Haven't needed the extra range as we're within 30mi of downtown Denver.

Have tried several indoor antennas on our bedroom TV. It was a simple hook up one screw did not even use the amplifier and are receiving 18 channels most of which in HD. I would recommend this antenna to anyone that has had trouble with other ones we're very happy with this unit. Thank you

We had purchased an antenna that wasn't picking up our channels and a family member recommended this product. It arrived quickly, was easy to install, and works beautifully. They use stick-on backing to hang on the wall, not push pins, so you should take your time in considering where you will place it if you need to put it on the wall. We are getting channels that we have never received before and the picture is perfect. I would buy this again.

Well it was very easy to setup and while I didn't expect much of a result I was pleasantly surprised that I pulled in 41 channels with good signals. While I don't know about the 200mile range part I was able to pull in all known local channels with ease and I didn't mount it near a window, only aimed at one.

I brought a HDTV antenna "u must have" from Amazon. The antenna is great. It is easy to set up you just plug it in put it in the window/wall and scan for your channels. The picture quality is very clear. I love it and I would buy it again.

The HDTV  Antenna is a great product. It is an indoor and directional antenna. I live in the San Fransisco Bay Area about 60 miles south of San Fransisco. Installed it with ease and positioned the antenna towards San Fransisco in one of my upstairs bedroom wall, closer to the ceiling. Picked up about 45 San Fransisco TV channels. 20 of them were in English and the remaining were in Vietnamese, Chinese, Spanish and other languages. Picture quality of the ones that I am interested in is very good.Great product, elegant design and I highly recommend it.

This was very simple to hook up and find channels. I installed it behind the tv in the living room (exterior wall) using Command velcro strips, and only one local channel had weak reception. I also tested this recently during a storm, and that station had too weak of a signal to show at all, while other stations were somewhat choppy, if anything. I wish I had a better place to install it to improve reception, but I definitely would buy again.

Although dtv.gov showed I could get a weak signal where I live, I get no stations. One station is around 36 miles away straightline distance. I live in a hilly area, but my home is fairly high in the hills with the closest hill about 1000 feet higher than the house. I was just hoping this would work.

This was the second HDTV Antenna I purchased due to the original getting the cord ripped off do to a window being opened to fast.  I live way out in the country surrounded by a lot of trees and this antenna does great.  I do get more channels on it during the winter months due to the lack of leaves on the trees but even during the summer I get a good amount.  The picture quality is awesome and set up is a breeze.

I wasn't sure if this would work but my son installed it in two minutes and after the 10 minutes for set up - we received over 40 free channels with excellent picture quality. We are 25 miles from the closest large city but that wasn't an issue. If you can switch between your streaming channels and your cable provider, you can switch just as easily to the hd antenna for viewing. Just need to buy a standalone DVR and then we'll be cancelling our Dish contract. Looking forward to it!

I'm not quite getting 120 mile range, but I live in a Row Home, and I'm in a valley. I was surprised by the quality of the HD picture and I get 29 channels. My only regret is that I should have done it sooner. We had to try about 10 different locations, within a few feet of each other the number of channels ranged from 9 to 29.Very happy with this Antenna.

Easy to setup. I get channels for free now, I was able to get rid of cable. I was paying over $100 a month to watch my local channels which is broadcasted free, does that make sense? Lol...no it dont. This will allow you to cut your cable for watching local channels.

I can’t even begin to tell you how satisfied I am with the purchase of this HDTV antenna. I set up the antenna on my new 75 inch TV and I started flipping through channels and I was so amazed on the quality of all the channels and the amount of channels that I’m able to see with this HDTV antenna. There are so many choices out there but I am so happy and glad that I bought this particular one because of all the channels I get. I would highly highly highly recommend purchasing this product/HDTV antenna to anyone, I would actually buy this product again.

I wish I had used this antenna to cut my cable TV costs by $100 per month. I am so Busy nowdays. This free TV antenna lets me watch local and US news for free. I added a little HULU and I am set.I will likely buy a second TV antenna for my second bedroom.

I installed the U Must Have HDTV antenna this morning and receive 22 channels.  It was so easy to set up, plug in the coaxial cable, plug in the USB cable. Stick the antenna and search for channels. I stuck the antenna to the back of my television even, so not to notice it in the room.  I am very satisfied with the purchase.

This is an INCREDIBLE addition to my TV purchase!!  I was skeptical on how this would work for the new TVs, but I have access to over 50 channels in the Tucson AZ area!  Crystal clear and fantastic reception!!  Cannot beat this deal!  Purchase with out hesitation!!  Just follow the simple setup instructions!!

I recently disconnected cable because we weren't watching it enough to be paying so much for it. But Football season is here!!! I bought this antenna hoping it will give me my local channels to be able to catch some of the games. I was so excited that it did. It was ever easy to set up,  either power it thru your tv usb or an outlet and plug in the cable. Find a good place to stick the antenna and you are good to go.

I was skeptical; living in rural NC near the VA border in a valley at the foot of a mountain where two rivers come together, reception has always been a challenge.  THIS antenna rocks.  25 stations loud and clear and the nearest broadcast transmitter is 50+ miles.  Took about 45 minutes to find the right spot and received ABC, CBS, NBC, ION,CW, Fox andf a slew of substations.  Best 30 bucks I ever spent

I just installed my HDTV antenna and I am so impressed. I had an older hd antenna that I had purchased a few years ago and my reception had become increasingly poor. This one was easy to set up and right away I got all of the local stations back, plus about 10 more!

Cannot speak for other reviewers or read other reviews. For my experience, it is great! Easy setup, great picture, cable is long enough that an extension wasn’t necessary. Power plug supplied to plug the usb amplification into an outlet instead of the back of the TV. Got 56 digital OTA channels from within  my local area. Cannot give it enough thumbs up! Would highly recommend to those seeking to cut ties with cable!

I recently bought one of these HD TV Antennas and installed it in my attic, as I was ditching the high-dollar EXPEN$IVE Cable TV subscription that I have had for over 20 years. Got tired of them CONSTANTLY RAISING PRICES, and not getting very much in return, as I didn’t watch that many channels. So, I hooked up this antenna, and I’m VERY PLEASED with the results! I’m about 25 miles from all the local stations here in Oklahoma City, and they ALL come through very clearly! And, your antenna was very reasonably priced. Just as advertised! D.

I bought this antenna for my husband's birthday in July. The hope was just to use this antenna and Amazon Prime and get rid of cable.Our son- in- law just hooked it up two weeks ago.To my surprise it worked great! Really great. We had really great reception. I wasn't expecting that. I am delighted with the quality of the antenna. Kudos!
I love my antenna! I recently cut cable and needed a way to watch local TV. I now have access to more channels than I expected and I like having the built to pause by adding a USB drive to my TV.

First antenna since the switch to digital several years back.  I'm pretty impressed.  All of the major stations in LA have sister stations and many of them air vintage TV shows. But the cable provider doesn't offer one of my favorites.  So this is a great alternative.  I was still not getting clear reception of some channels. I found that if i flipped it around, some would come thru.  It works best on my balcony so i wish the cable was slimmer to fit thru the door.  But that's pretty much my only complaint.  I have a huge sliding glass door in the living room, no windows. And it's currently working best on the floor next to the door.

After cutting the cord I was wondering what to do to at least watch all the local channels so I research and came across this one. After taking it out of the package reading the easy instructions this 67-year-old woman had installed the antenna that brought in picture quality you would have thought I had cable again. I receive over 50 free channels!

This is the HDTV antenna I was looking for to provide local channels including news, entertainment, and even some radio stations. I am amazed at the picture clarity with a 77” television. Setup was easy , just plug it in and scan. No worries, it works well! This is the right product when it’s time to “cut the cord”.

Over the last 5 years or so, I have tried every antenna count less sizes shapes and was never satisfied with the picture quality. I was floored when I turned my new TCL on antenna and the quality of the video was superb. The folks at U MUST HAVE have a great product. Buy one and see for yourself. You'll be glade you did.
120 mile?  please!!!!!  terrible reception and I only receive 44 channel and most of the are repeatednot worth spending your money in this product

I have to give this antenna 5 stars. I don’t give them lightly. I live on the outskirts of my city so I needed an antenna that could reach the tower quite a bit away from me. The HD quality picture I get from this antenna is exceptional! Simple setup. All, and i mean all my channels are crystal clear. This is a purchase you won’t go wrong with.

Very great! Works exactly as described! I live in Jacksonville FL and get 30-40 channels. Comcast wanted an extra $50 a month for just 10 channels.This streams perfect with no glitches or anything. I have a Samsung 4K and I’m the picture quality is great. 100% worth the price!

I've been having problems getting certain local channels in my hometown so I went onto Amazon and purchased your amplified HD digital TV antenna. I no longer have any problems getting channels and don't have to move this antenna around the room to the perfect location to get channels. I'm very impressed with this antenna! Thanks for making a good product.

This antenna was supposed to enable us to "cut the cord" from cable TV.  However, after carefully following instructions for installation, and then for different placements for best reception, I never could receive local stations.  Many of the stations I was able to receive had poor reception, with a lot of pixilization.  I finally gave up, and went back to cable.

I am very happy with this antenna. It looks great, easy to set up, and gets a good, clear signal with more channels than my previous antenna got. I'd definitely recommend this to anyone looking to supplement their streaming services with some good over the air Tv.
This antenna is amazing. So very easy to set up and picture quality is excellent. The antenna worked virtually anywhere in my bedroom. Channel selection was just what I wanted. Great value.

The antenna is pretty good. I am able to get channels that I normally wouldn't get without paying. I can watch football for free instead of going to an app and pay for it or keep watching the news to see updates of the score. My only complaint is when I scan my channels with the antenna and come back another day it would have bad signal. Other than that the antenna is great.

They offer you a free 2nd antenna for a good review, which I declined. The main stations I want are about 40 miles west of town, but this antenna only gets them once in a while. All the other stations are about 55 miles northeast, and this antenna almost never gets those. Pretty much a waste of money for me. Might work for you if you're closer to the broadcasting towers.

We live about 35 miles east of Columbus,  Ga in a small heavily wooded valley. We had a cheaper version previously and received about 6 channels.  We mounted this newer one in an upper window and are getting over 20 channels routinely and the picture is ABSOLUTELY GORGEOUS!! Installation was easy, took more time getting ladder in position and climbing it.

My experience has been one of great relief to be able to drop my cable tv subscription and use this antenna instead. It was easy to install and is nicely picking up some local stations that allow us to watch the news.. We were most hoping to pick up our local PBS station, which we have not been able to do with any consistency. However, I just ordered an extension coaxial cable and will put the antenna in a window that faces the recommended direction for my geographic area. Overall, I am very pleased with my purchase. It was affordable and helps us save lots of money each month that we were wasting on Cable TV.

Perfect! I ordered this because I wanted to watch football this season and the old antenna I had bought was only picking up about 5 channels. I got the package, opened it up and in about 5 minutes I had over 50 channels! Couldn’t be happier with the immediate results. The picture quality is great and clear and everything I would want out of my tv watching experience. Totally ready for football now!

I read reviews and really based my decision on selecting this antenna on trust.  It was rather easy to attach to antenna port just need to remember to switch tv to antenna mode.  I live close to a foreign country border so I picked up a few of their channels too.  My suggestion is once you find a spot for the antenna leave it alone.  Im very happy to have my locals back and recommend this product to others.

I live 61 miles from the furthest local channels, therefor I purchased the amplified version with a range of 120 miles in hopes to pull in the 4 local network channels. I have moved this antenna all over the room, in windows, outside of windows on the bed etc. It will only find the local CBS channel 5 when the antenna is laying flat on the bed. Very disappointed with this antenna's range as it obviously is nowhere near capable of receiving signal from just 60 miles away. I'm  still trying to find a solution or deciding if I want to keep this at all. The good is that the when it does get signal the picture is very good.

I ordered this one on Amazon based on the reviews and it certainly has lived up to expectations. It replaced a similar one I bought several years ago on Amazon and the results are amazing. I had to drape the wire for the old antenna across the room and mount it on a window far away to get mediocre reception. My new one is mounted just above the TV and pulls in more stations with no fuzzy picture at all. Thanks.

Hi,Bought your antenna and it works great. Before when anyone would get up or walk in front of the TV we would lose the pic and or sound.  It is nice to finally be able to watch CBS and/or NBC stations without interruption.  Unfortunately, you cannot fix the lack of quality shows to watch…We live about 25 miles out and have tried a bunch of different antennas... yours is the best by far.  Nice slim design.
This antenna works great! I had another similar one but it kept on cutting in and out of the channels. This one keeps the channels clear and the signal keeps going. Great antenna and great price

We ordered this product for our Guest Room as we do not have DirecTV there.  We have been using rabbit ear type digital antenna, but it is so bulky and has to be moved to pick up different local channels.  This HDTV Antenna is easy to install, a quality product, totally hidden from site and does not have to be moved around.  But the best thing is that t has such clarity on the TV and picks up and actually lets you watch so many channels.  This is the best antenna we have ever had!

We cut the cable out almost 2 years ago and just didn't watch much TV. I occasionally missed watching local news or sports, but never found a streaming service that had what I wanted AND didn't cost nearly as much as cable. I don't know why I never thought about an antenna, but I did some research and ended up buying this one. I tried it in a few places, and it gave a different number of channels each location I tried. The best spot ended up being on the wall behind the TV so it isn't even visible. I live right between 2 large cities, so now I have 55 channels to watch! Very happy with the product.

I bought this to replace an older existing antenna. This one picks up more channels, has clearer picture, and cuts down on interference from planes taking at nearby airport. Easy to install and set up.

I am very impressed, I was mainly wanting to get my local channels since cutting the cord on cable, without being in  a window I am able to get 34 of the 51 channels channel checker says are available.The clarity is awesome.  It was easy to connect.

My husband built me a hobby house in our backyard. It is a place for me to hang out and do all my craft things with my grandchildren, as well as hang out with family and friends in a relaxed environment. It is located in the lower part of our property; kind of like being down in a hollow. I have tried three different antennas and were unsuccessful - until I used this antenna! I am able to get the basic channels to include NBC - which has been a problem for everybody in our viewing area. I just want to say I like this antenna, it did exactly what it was advertised to do and I am really enjoying it!
I ordered this product due to the fact I cant get cable at school. It was a great buy and well worth it. Easy to install and set up. i had in working in minutes. Fully recommend this product

I thought this was a good purchase made because I was getting rid of the costly cable service in the home.  It was a snap to install and gives a clear picture.  Due to our location the TV scanned and located 30+ channels which is good for local stations and some others.  In the future we will be adding perhaps a firestick or roku to have a bit more variety for entertainment.  This is a nice antenna and was a great purchase.

This has to be the best OTA antenna I have ever had. Very discreet yet powerful. It is hidden behind my wall mounted television. Can’t even tell it is there. Ran an initial scan and I picked up 34 channels. Ran a second and now have 47. All are crisp pictures with little to no fuzz between sub channels (9.1,9.2...). Fantastic antenna for a great price.

This antenna is light and easy to install. If your TV has a USB port in can be used to power the antenna instead of the included power adapter. The reception is better than cable. I would like to see various color choices or even designs.

Our family cut our Directv Service from 3 different homes and I bought this Antenna hoping to get all the channels I usually watch. So far, it works perfectly. Comes in clear just like with cable and/or satellite.  Also the long cord was great as I had to put it closer to a window. Couldn't be happier. Thank you for a great product.Side Note: My mother bought a different antenna and got about half the channels that I did, she just purchased this one as a replacement.

This antenna was easy to install and program.  We receive several additional channels than with our previous antenna.  The clarity of the picture is very good.  Right now, I'd highly recommend this antenna for HDTV sets.

I picked up all 23 channels that were in my area- and 3 that were not mentioned. It took some to figure out the best spot...I just taped it to a spot and then ran the auto channel scan and moved it around a couple times too I got it what I picked up the most channels.

Thanks you for this great product.  Most antennas similar to this have a 60 mile range.  We live out in the country right in between the two major broadcast areas and the signals we receive using other antennas were very poor or not at all.  With you antenna, I received 35 channels including cbs, fox, nbc, and abc all crystal clear and most in HD.  This antenna even out performs the outdoor antenna I have mounted.Installation was simple and straight forward.  The antenna was a quarter of the size I thought it would be and is easy to mount in an inconspicuous place.  Overall, 5 out of 5 stars

This antenna has to be flat mounted and if your wall/window/door  is not perpendicular to your target area you could have a problem.  It is also designed to hang from the top, no bottom support at all.  I am a woodworker and I solved this problem by using my table saw to make a shallow saw kerf in a piece of scrap pine.  The bottom edge of the antenna sits in this groove and the unit stands upright and of course can be turned 360 degrees.  With this done the unit gets a near perfect picture on our 10yr old tv and it pick up 25 channels, we love it !!

Just bought this as my first HD antenna to use since I recently made the choice to completely CUT THE CABLE and I wanted an option to get local networks for sports and FOOTBALL!I was just hoping to pick up 4-5 channels and the local networks, but to my surprise I picked up 61 channels!!!
What a great antenna. Seriously, our picture quality from another antenna we used is so much better and access to more channels. The USB power off of the TV was a brilliant idea!!

I just bought your X002B69ZR1 120 mile antenna on Amazon and honestly had pretty low expectations when I placed the order. Wow - was I wrong. This antenna is beyond awesome. Ordered the product and received within just a few days. Install was a breeze, took maybe 5 min. I scan for the channels and surprisingly I have over 50 channels. Depending on where I hang the antenna, I can get up to 35 stations with excellent reception quality.  My only complaint is that although I get CBS, NBC, and Fox, among others,so far I have been unable to get ABC in my location (25 mile north of Philly).

I recently purchased two hdtv Antennas because we were sick and tired of these overpriced cable bills every month. I searched through amazon and came across this hdtv antenna for a very affordable price, shipping was very fast and efficient.The setup was very simple it took me less than 10 minutes to set up both antennas. Instructions were easy to understand. The picture quality is beyond amazing! Super clear and no interference.  We are very pleased with this purchase

I recently purchased this antenna for a secondary TV in my home.  Upon installation I found that I now have at least 37 channels as opposed to 19 with the Clear Channel  antenna.  I am very pleased with the quality of the channels that come in as they are much clearer and do not go in and out.  The wiring to this antenna is much less conspicuous that the Clear Channel antenna.  I would highly recommend this antenna if you are cutting the cord to cable as it picks up local broadcast stations and more very well.

I got this to put in my guest bedroom, which sees visitors once or twice a year. I wanted my guests to have access to tv without paying for more cable. This was a great answer for about $30. It was simple to set up and I was able to move it a few times to see where I got the best reception. I get most of the major channels very clearly - NBC, CBS, FOX, ION and about 25 others that offer some variety. I will probably try some other placements to see if I can get ABC and PBS.

This is a great antenna for the price. It has a really good range of over 100 miles so that I can get all of the local channels that I need. I would recommend this product to anyone needing an antenna for any room in their home.

This antenna was quick and easy to install, and it is working great. We did not even need the optional amplifier; our television broadcast towers are 15-20 miles away. The reception is very clear, and we are able to receive all available free channels. We are very pleased.

This antenna was as advertised and more. I opened it (minimal packaging which I appreciate) and had it hooked up to my 12 year old tv with in 3-4 minutes. I wasn’t sure about air scan or digital scan so I did both. After I figured out that I needed air scan the channels were loaded with in 2-3 minutes. I had an antenna of a different brand on another tv and it does not get near as many channels is this one does.  Clearly the range is much better on this new antenna and I didn’t have to put it in a window. Last, but not least, this antenna was $8.00 less than my original antenna!

This antenna has a great picture and was very easy to install.  I like how it can be powered through the TV via USB port eliminating extra dangling cords.  I now can receive 54 channels.  Highly recommend.

We are cutting the cord in both homes.  We got one of these free with a subscription to one of the services we use now s and bought this one  and 3 more of the more expensive ones.  These work MUCH better than the ones we spent almost twice as much on.

Love this antenna.  It is so easy to set up, and I played with it a little in different positions to get the most channels.  Why didn't I do this years ago instead of getting taken to the cleaners by Spectrum!!  Worth every penny!

I received the antenna today. I attached it to the roof on the second floor of my house and I was able to get 52 channels!!! My old antenna only picked up 5 or 6 channels. The picture is amazing!!! 10 out of 10 would recommend to a friend!!!

Amazing antenna, especially if u are ditching cable like I did and have a smart TV . Very easy to install and it is perfect to put anywhere comes with everything you need :) Great customer service!!! Highly recommend!!

We had an older TV antenna and were not able to get most local channels and some were not very clear. When I installed the new antenna in the attic, plugged it into the TV we got all but the PBS station which is running on low power and our location quite difficult to receive their signal. All the other stations come in strong and clear. I watched football this weekend and was amazed of the clarity and picture quality. I love this new antenna and recommend anyone looking for an antenna to this great antenna.

I purchased the GESOBYTE Amplified HD Digital TV Antenna Long 200+, Miles Range, from Amazon, and of course, it was here in 1 day! The setup of my digital antenna was super easy and I was able to watch HD TV in a matter of minutes. I moved the antenna a couple of places to get the best signal and was able to get a lot of channels quickly. Thank you for such a great product and I am so glad I do not have to rely on satellite or Netflix.

After thorough research, the antenna was chosen for its description and I was not disappointed.  It was delivered with excellent instructions on how to install and set up to the TV.  It was very easy to understand and was installed within a very short time and the picture quality is excellent.  It is installed on our window for the bedroom TV.  I would highly recommend this item to my friends.

We recently bought a fixer upper and we are currently renting until our house is ready.  Because of this, we decided not to purchase cable for just a temporary situation.  We purchased this antenna because it was reasonably priced and had really good reviews.  I can honestly say, that after using this, we love it!  No need for cable in the future.  We get most Atlanta stations and even some Chattanooga station.  We receive a very clear pictures.  It’s a great product at a great price.

We just installed our new HDTV Antenna and absolutely love it. First we try it right next to TV in our downstairs home and got good amount of channels including FOX, CBS, NBC but ABC was missing. Then we we followed the manufacturers recommendation: higher the better, so we installed it in our attic and boy we almost doubled our channels. We got ABC !. The picture is so clear, do I dare to say even better than our cable. We look forward to canceling our TV provider and watching more local channels.Thanks for a great product!

I installed this antenna at an apartment complex that does not have cable TV any longer and residents had to find an alternative. From a standard antenna, we only received 6 channels and they were not that great. After installing this antenna, we now get 22+ channels and they are crystal clear!

This thing sucks. It’s inexpensive so I’m not really upset but my $5 antenna gets better reception than this. This thing struggles to get local channels. As of right now I can only pick up 2 local channels and to top it off, it constantly drops signal.

This antenna was very easy to put together and install, even if you’re not tech savvy. I am a senior citizen and a female, but did it all by myself. It has a great picture and allows me to get my local channels without being a cable subscriber. I love it!

Great antenna. I unboxed the antenna, connected the cable to my TV, connected the power cord, and put the antenna in the window. Then I switched my TV to ‘antenna’ mode, went to ‘Setup’ on my TV and scanned for stations. I got perfect reception on over 40 channels.That is all there is to it.

Hooked it up today.  It was very easy. To be honest,  I wasn't expecting much.  I scanned the channel's and it picked up 44 channels. When i went through the channel's only about 30 channels were watchable. I am happy with this product.
It took a little fiddling with the TV to get it figured out, but once I got it all right, I ended up with at least 40 channels!  All I really wanted was the news, but I got quite a bit more!

Just got my HDTV antenna and I am thrilled with it! I have to admit, my expectations were very low when I purchased it since I've tried a few other brands of which I ended up returning. But the quality is excellent, far better than what I expected!After cutting the cable years ago, I haven't watched much TV since. Now I'm so happy that I can get dozens of channels - FOR FREE! News, sports, tv series etc. It almost seems too good to be true, especially for the price and ease of setup.

I like everything about it. Fast delivery, very easy to set up and works PERFECT.  Out of the box  it only took 5 minutes to set up. Then set the TV to auto select channels and within minutes BOOM!!  Perfect, crystal clear, over 50 HD channels. I was AMAZED!.  The best thing about it....Now I can "Cut The Cord" and stop paying my cable bill. True Free TV!!!

After having the antenna for a while now I can truly say that I am very pleased with the purchase. Had I known over a year ago how convenient and reliable digital antenna's are, I would have purchased one months ago. I recently cancelled my cable services and can still receive over 50 channels using the U Must Have digital antenna. The setup was very fast and for me the best signal is having it mounted on the window. All air and cable channels come in pretty clear and I am not seeing any issues so far.

My new Amplified HR Digital TV Antenna works as advertised and more. I am able to receive over eighty (80) DTV channels. I was able to cut the cable cord and save over $100 dollars a month. I highly suggest placing the antenna on a window for best results.

Unfortunately, I bought two of these receivers, thinking that their "150-mile" reception would outperform the the 50-mile receivers that I purchased from K-Mart three years ago. Big mistake. After having used them for several weeks I can unqualifiedly say that both manage to pick up fewer channels than either of my old receivers......as in 1/3 as many channels, including the local NBC, FOX and PBS stations [which are pumping out more watts than most others.]
Couldn;t believe that there was over 57 over the air stations available in my area.  i narrowed it down to about 37 channels that I would like to watch.  Works as good as cable.
Installation was quick, trouble free and performed as expected.Programming took about 6-7 minutes for the channels available here in the Boise Idaho area.

My daughter lives on a farm and in a remote location. There is no tv reception and they don't have access to cable company and since we have given her this device, she gets local news and a number of channels for free!. Great Way to get free tv!!!!!

I live in a valley right in the lowest part. I’ve tired every antenna that said the y would work. Oh they worked alright with me being the antenna adjuster all over. We recently decided to drop cable and switch to other means on my fire stick. But no local channels. I read about this antenna and thought I’d give it a try. To my amazement I have 30 channels!!!! ABC, NBC, and CBS, and many other channels! I’m extremely happy and highly recommend this to anyone!

I am very happy with this antenna, it works great, super clear HD picture. It took about five minutes to set up,just follow the directions. For the first time in 30 years I have finally gotten rid of cable. I do stream some but with all the channels I’m getting with this antenna I watch shows with it about 90% of the time. The price was very good too

Going from cable to Antenna wasn’t an easy choice and I was hesitant thinking that the channels and picture quality wouldn’t be the same. To my surprise this Antenna has exceeded my expectations. Many channels available and extremely clear.  It’s an extremely cloudy day today and the picture quality is still very nice.

First time buying a tv antenna. Bought it for my 76 year old mom to give her basic channels. It was super easy to install and surprisingly we were able to get over 30 channels! Highly recommend this product if looking for free tv.

I’m very pleased with the antenna. I can now get all local channels without having to readjust each time or worry about bumping it and having to relocate the channel. It is only occasionally affected by strong winds. It was very easy to connect and put up.

I should have done this a couple of years ago!  The quality is super sharp--it really does look HD.  Easy to hook up (especially because I was already using a lower-grade digital antenna).  Nice, long cord.  I highly recommend this product!

Overall i get great quality pictures and about 30 channels or so. The only thing i would like is to have a bigger sticker to stick the antenna easier on the wall so it stays up without falling.Update: after awhile we started losing fox 8. But channel 5 (abc) was pretty clear. Now we cannot get a signal on either channel. Seems like the antenna quality is not good and it phases out overtime.

I have installed three antennas around the house and we are receiving upwards of 36 channels including all major networks, local channels and PBS. Overall a very good product save a couple of issues with the RF connector to the antenna and amplifiers. The solder joint came free on the ground plane for one antenna and two amplifiers. Tried to reflow the solder for the antenna and it didn't work. It did work for the two amplifiers. May need to re-engineer your soldering method. Thanks so much.

We purchased this antenna when we decided to cancel our DISH subscription. To be completely transparent, we purchased through Amazon so that when it didn't work, we could return it. Our home is in the country and we haven't had great luck with over the air channels.  An outdoor antenna was recommended, but we're trying to avoid it if possible. We were shockingly surprised with how well this antenna worked. We probably should still get an outdoor antenna for better reception, but this little unit gets us plenty of channels unless there's a storm in the area.

Pretty easy setup!  When channel comes in the picture is perfect.  (Signal strength better at night, but that’s what my neighbors say is normal, so it’s not the ‘U Must Have Antenna’).  Would recommend.

I received my antenna early December and am not disappointed.   I really like the long cable.  I live in a small rural town and it can be difficult at times to get certain channels.   Being able to move the antenna to different areas makes it easier to get the channels.

I received my antenna as a gift from my daughter on Tuesday, 5/12/20. I have tried the antenna on both of my sets and the reception is excellent. In addition, I am receiving more channels than I ever expected considering that there is a tree line on the side and a field with a treeline behind my home. The best part is the cost of the antenna is a real bargain.

My experience to date with this brand of Ultra-Thin 2020 HDTV Antenna.  As this is the third one I have purchased 2 for the house and one for the office tv.  Haven't been able to pull in any ESPN channels yet, but each antenna has over 20+ total channels on each tv.They seem pretty solid and good so far, once two I purchased just before Christmas, and just got this third one, second one fro home.  Great powered Antenna for the cost!

I am very pleased with this antenna. It has exceeded my expectations.  The Antenna picked up stations from 35 miles away.  I was finally able to convince my elderly father to cancel cable TV.This little antenna did the job.

I just bought your antenna I am very impressed by the receptivity that it has. I tried it first in the room close to the window and of course it worked perfectly but then I tried it in the kitchen with no windows (and I was very hesitant!) but I can watch all the channels very clearly and with no problem.Easy to install, no hassle.
Best purchase made for this item.  Didn't realize so many free channels readily available.  Picture is perfect.Finally breaking that cable dependency where local channels is concerned and beyond

I've tried a couple different, pricier antennas with "special functions" and they were all very sensitive to location and surrounding objects.  This antenna had no trouble getting reception and the extra long power and antenna cables made mounting in a optimum location quick and easy.

So easy to install. Picture is very clear. I am disappointed that really ABC is the only main channel with news. I was hoping for pbs :(I’m 50 miles from Chicago so I was hoping for more. Anyhow we’ll see what hubby thinks.

I've been a slave to cable/satellite for years but recently took the plunge and bought one of these Gesobite amplified HDTV antennas to see what it could do.  It arrived quickly, was super easy to set up and the picture is awesome...tons of channels too.  I liked it so much I bought two more for my mother.  Her Dish recently stopped airing ABC so she was elated to be able to watch it for free in high def.  Definitely recommend the Gesobite products!

I used to only get 24 channels with my old antenna and a lot of the time I never got a clear picture or the sound was never right. With my new HDTV antenna I get 67 channels and they are all perfectly clear! I can't believe it! I would recommend this antenna to anyone, it is by far the best. I'm so excited that I can actually flip through the channels now and know that anything I want to watch will be perfectly clear! Thank you!
It works as advertised.  I normally get 35-40 channels with other antennas. I ran channel scan and I got a whopping 52. The picture quality is great.  I couldn't be happier.

Great antenna, picks up more channels than other antenna's I have used. Easy setup and includes power adapter (if TV does not have a USB plug) as well as adhesive to attach the antenna to a wall or window.

Purchased two of these to be installed on secondary TVs to receive the major network channels (e.g. NBC, CBS, ABC, FOX) and it accomplished exactly what was needed!  The big plus is the ease of setup (in minutes) and HD quality with the local area channels is very good.  It was especially helpful that these antennas can be placed on the interior wall of house and they pickup channels just fine.

We have been using this Digital HDTV Antenna for a few weeks. It works great. I had to move it around to find the best spot, but when I finally found it we were able to receive several channels without getting the weak signal message and static.

I just received my new Gesobyte HDTV from Amazon. This antenna is outstanding and definitely an upgrade over all of the previous HDTV antennas I have purchased in the past. With this product, I was able to pick up at over 60 channels in the Dallas Fort Worth area. In fact, I had never been able to pick the ABC affiliate (WFAA) before in my downstairs den and now that channel and several others that had poor reception before are coming in clearly. Great job on this product!

So far the HD antenna has been great. I previously had a different brand and it could not get some local channels that I normally have. Even when I move the antenna into a different location and rescan, several channels could not be found. Static and screen tearing happened a lot too. As soon as I scanned with the Gesobyte HD antenna, it found all my local channels and it looked nice and crisp. There were no static or tearing. Its been a great upgrade from my previous antenna.

"This slim antenna is excellent and absolutely discreet. It picks up all the local mainstream channels and more in the Washington, D.C. metropolitan area. I am struck by the quality of the broadcast and just how easy it was to install!"

We live on our boat during the summer on the Chesapeake Bay. We purchased this antenna and installed it onboard to replace our cable and Direct TV service while traveling. Connected antenna into connector on back of boat to supply both TV's on the boat. Antenna works great. We simply rescan our TV's when we arrive in a new location to receive the local stations. Highly recommend this antenna, Robert.

AWESOME!!!!  FIRST IT CAME TO MY HOUSE SUPER SUPER FAST!!!  I CONNECTED THE HDTV ANTENNA TO MY TV!  WHICH WAS VERY EASY AND ONLY TOOK A FEW MINUTES!  I POINTED THE HDTV ANTENNA IN THE DIRECTION OF THE HDTV TOWERS!  I INSTANTLY HAD ALL THE CHANNELS AVAILABLE WHERE I LIVE!!!!!I had first bought a hdtv antenna at walmart store here in town.  Omg I spent 3 days trying to get it to work.  All I could get is 4 channels.  So went on Amazon and bought a better one from ABASK TECH!  Was bigger and went further distance. Plus was same price as the junk I got from Walmart!!!!
Definitely high end product. Pulls channels in from far away with good picture quality. Was looking to upgrade but unfortunately was not better than what I’m using  now.

We cut the Satellite cord, saved a ton of $ doing it. This HD digital Antenna was a life saver. Rabbit ears weren't cutting it for all the local channels, now I've got all my channels back. Phew... Pictures are clear. Easy to install. Highly recommend, well worth the price.

I live in a rural area in Alabama, a rabbit ear antannae will give us 5 channels, weather permitting. After the digital conversion we could get 8 channels. I recently purchased the GB antannae and with the first scan had 24 channels coming in as clear as with the satelite. After some experimentation with positioning the channel count is up to 26. I couldn’t be happier with the antannae and no monthly charges.  J.M.

The HD antenna was extremely easy to install. The instructions were very clear. Within 15 minutes, I had added 24 channels to my watching options.I am going to install my girlfriend’s antenna this weekend. I am sure that she will be equally as thrilled with the results.

I have to say that we are LOVING this antenna. We tried another brand before and immediately sent it back. This HDTV antenna was the answer we were looking for. We are able to access 18 channels and it is wonderful!

This antenna beats our old digital antenna with rabbit ears by a mile. Picture quality is excellent and the flat panel design allows it to be placed almost anywhere in the room courtesy of the extra long connecting wire. Plus there’s no unsightly rabbit ears. It could not be easier to install.

I received my Gesobyte Antenna today. Found it a snap to install. I have been using an old Leaf Antenna from Mohu which is a good product but the Gesobyte enable me to get more channels 44 compared to 30 . I have always had problems with the reception of ABC and Fox but with this antenna both are sharp and clear. Yes I would recommend this antenna. I cut the cord and started using an antenna about 20 years ago. This is the best one I have had.

Fast Shipping! Quick and easy setup! We have and old old TV at work this Antenna worked perfectly. TV was ready to go in less than 10 minutes.  I would highly recommend this product for any one who doesn't have cable or doesn't want to pay for cable.

I like to watch local news but +$50/mo is not cheap. Installation took 15 minutes. I was expecting to have to place the antenna on 2nd floor elevation or buy a booster, but after physical install and using TV to scan channels, i get local ABC, Fox, NBC, etc.

Product preformed as expected. It arrived in just a few days after order even though amazon site showed delivery est almost a month out. Set up was easy but glad I read instructions, you will need program your tv but its easy. Picture quality is great and works very well in my area with my tv. I even sent a link for the product to a friend and they already ordered their own as well.

First to start off by saying this is super easy to install and the picture quality and range are great..my only dificulty was because my television did not have an accessible usb port and i was not using a digital reciever i had to improvise to make the cord long enough to plug in...this is only because of the model  of my TV and the location. the product is great...though slightly over priced hence 4 stars.

We installed this and had 50 new channels in under 5 minutes. I was really amazed at the picture quality and ease of use. I highly recommend this over the old school rabbit ears. Plus it works much better.
Super product. Installed in less than 5 minutes. I am receiving over 60 FREE channels. Absolutely one of my best purchases. No more cable bills for me. LOVE THIS ANTENNA!

I had researched best TV antennas for the money and was happy to find that Amazon sold the one that seemed to be best for my needs.  It was very easy to install - I hung my antenna high on an outside wall and so far have 32 channels and all of the network channels.  After leaving cable a few months ago, I found that I missed network stations.  I now have them and a lot more!  I highly recommend this antenna.

I have moved the antenna 3-4 times for better results but wherever I move it to I keep losing channels off and on. I bought it because I stopped my cable service, but can't seem to count on even local channels coming in. One day I have a clear channel the next it doesn't even come in. My son has a cheaper antenna from a well known store and he has no problem, maybe will get the same, tired of running a channel scan.

Very easy to install, just stick it on and you're done, using it with HDHomeRun Quatro Scribe DVR, works fantastic. One lesson learned, even though it recommends to mount on a window - if you have Pella windows or similar with built-in metal blinds, these blinds kill the signal, rather mount it next to it on the wall.

What delightfully surprised at the volume of content that is available over the air for FREE.  Reminds me of living in the 80s where having an antenna was a very common household thing.  However, there is no bulky antenna to install on your roof and wires to drop to each room.  Bought the Digital HDTV Antenna and installed it in 20-mins or less.  The antenna is flat like a sheet of paper and is white or black to best match your preferred location.  Mine is on the side of my bookcase nearest a window where it is out of sight.  Hope you enjoy your HDTV antenna as much as I do!

I installed this product today and it is working great! Easy to understand and install, it took less than 10 minutes, even with the kids ‘helping’. More TV is good these days as it helps to break up the daily monotony of staying at home.

I tried other antennas that cost more than the GB antenna. The GB antenna worked twice as good as the more expensive ones. It provides double the number of clear HD channels. Buy it you will be satisfied with it..  5 🌟

I just purchased this HDTV antenna and it has been the best choice. The installation was super easy. You don't need any tools to set it up on your wall. It is very lightweight and does not take up any space in my living room. The quality for each channel is amazing! I now have access to channels I didn't have before. I would definitely purchase again.

I have been cable and dish free for a couple of years, using an antenna is the way to go. I recently purchased a new 4K TV and needed another antenna.  This HDTV antenna is amazing. So easy to set up, the reception is second to none.  Very happy with this antenna.

purchased this hdtv antenna from amazon.  I’m not a big fan of cable tv coz I only watch local channels. I made the right decision. Oh boy! The pictures and channels receptions are amazing. Completely recommend this product!  Great purchase

My wife and I purchased a Digital HDTV Antenna and have found it to be better than expected. We bought it as we wanted a way to watch our local and network channels without the cable subscription and have been more than pleased with our purchase.
This is so easy to use and exceeded my expectations.  I gave one to my mom when her cable was out.  She found channels she loves that are not in her cable package.  She had me get her another one.

I like this product. It works quite well, it is easy and fast to put up.  I live about 60 miles from the closest TV stations with a ridge of mountains in between and I get all the stations. As soon as I put it in the window I got 20 stations immediately and after setting up the TV I now get 46. The signals have been very good and steady. I would recommend this unit.

This HD Antenna worked Awesome. It works way better than the Antenna I bought from Best Buy. I have all the available local channels Crystal Clear. Aiso the Prime Shipping arrived a day earlier than promised.

Wanted to share the experience with the new HD antenna. Immediately when connected and scanned for channels. 27 new channels to watch for no monthly charge. Placement means alot and this was placed in a bedroom. Will definitely try out new locations tee see what we can get

Thank you for producing an HD TV antenna that works and pulls in most of my local channels in beautiful HD crisp and clear colors.  This is exactly what I need to get rid of COMCAST and save a lot of money each year.

My experience with the antenna has been excellent. I installed a new TV the same day I installed the antenna and was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was! I discovered that having it by the window is definitely better than having it away from one and was able to find about 50 channels.The cord was more than long enough to reach from the tv to the window and even line along the edges, so the cord isn’t in the way.
Great HD antenna !Easy to install, compact; works great fo me on a 40 ft run.  Amplifier is near the TV.

Easy to install. Surprised at the thinness of the product; you use sticky pads to attach to wall, which has made me reluctant to move it. We came up short a couple major channels after rescanning with this. Though it has 18’ of wire, we need to extend even further to get to a window. So, we will continue to work with it. 4 stars ‘cuz it hasn’t done all we need. To be continued...
Hard to find just the right place for antenna. Great on local PBS local stations that have gone HD. Not as clear on regular network. Took getting used to switching back and forth.

I recently added this antenna to my Roku TV.  We live in a rural area and our TV choices are limited.  It was so easy to set up. the directions were great!  I scanned one time and got 25 channels. I moved the antenna and rescanned and got 32 channels!  the Guide is also easy to find and use. The co-ax cable is very long, and they even included a USB adapter. They thought of everything to make this easy & very useable. Very happy with my purchase.

We got this handy little device for my mother who is in a Senior living facility, she loves to watch her talk shows and Westerns  throughout the day and since getting this Amplifier she has been able to resume life as normal. This antenna was simple to install and we have not had to adjust it having it. Great signal, great buy!

received my antenna today and I immediately hooked it up.  Hook up was very easy and I was able to get 35 channels.  The reception was very clear.  I bought this antenna because my existing antenna (also powered HD antenna) did not work well and have pixelated pictures for 4-5 channels.  I am pleasantly surprised with the new antenna, the channels that I had problems with before and now with very clear pictures.I am very pleased with the quality of the product and its performance.  Five stars.  I would recommend this to a friend.

It was my first experience in using an hdtvantenna, and let me tell you, after adjusting just a couple of times it is now situated near a ceiling, not even a window (across from my sliding door, and all of the stations it picks up are either crystal clear or near it--HD quality. The instructions are literally only 3 steps, and then it is just finding the right place to put it where all of your main channels (fox, abc, nbc, cbs) come in clear with a few others like ion and bounce that were nice additions, among others. I did see a kids/cartoon channel as well, among others.  Now I have the chance to cancel my subscription for my cable--so purchasing this will not let you down--I would check the signal strength from the towers--perhaps if you were out too far--but I saw that this particular model's range was top of the line when it comes to these things. I am very happy with this product and would recommend to others.

I choose this antenna because of the top rating on amazon and I'm glad I did. My last antenna was only able to pick up one channel and that was on a sunny clear day. The day I received the antenna it was stormy but I still choose to try it out and I was able to pick up 16 channels after my initial placement and one channel scan. I live in a log cabin that doesn't have great reception and 30+ miles from all the receivers, so glad I choose this antenna!

I got my antenna from Amazon today and with no hesitation installed it on my Panasonic TV. I can’t believe that the set up is so straightforward and I got 62 digital channels for free - including ABC, CBS, NBC, FOX, PBS, CW, HSN, QVC. Now I don’t have to pay expensive cable service and directly enjoy the live news.The antenna is a solid piece, easy to stick on the back wall of my TV. I’m so regretted that didn’t have it earlier. Strong recommendation to people around!

Due to Hurricane Laura passing through our area, the cable company we have used for years has damaged equipment. At 3 weeks since the storm's eye passed through, we have electricity but  no hope of reestablishing er cable or internet service. No sign of cable trucks to be seen. we have decided to use an antenna and Amazon Fire Stick to be able to watch tv. We received the Geobyte HD antenna today. We are enjoying NFL football on CBS right now.  We can get the news, too! that is vital as TS Beta is heading this way with bands of rain and wind. The antenna was easy to setup. So, 3* for doing a good job for the very local, and nothing more, as the actual effective range is about 25% of what they claim.

I was kind of apprehensive at 1st in purchasing but I am glad I finally did because it was very easy to install and I was able to get 61 channels so tv watching will be pleasant again without the high cost of cable.

We put the antennae in the window, pinned it to the sash then hooked it up to the cable in at the back of our 12-year old tv. It was simple to install and simple to scan for channels. I was skeptical but now I can lay in bed in the morning and watch news, public and commercial programming. I recommend this antennae and I plan to have another ... or two.
Super easy to install!!!  Great picture!! Went from sometimes 7 channels to 22!!!
