We just installed our antenna today for the kickoff of the NFL season and I have been very impressed.  We are not particularly close to the signal (in terms of miles), and I have the antenna on the opposite side of the house than the direction of the signal, and it is still working excellently.

Just received my antenna and it was very easy to install. I was able to receive 27 channels right away but many were duplicates and not very clear. The ones that were clear were crystal clear. The amount of channels I was able to receive seemed to depend on several factors such as weather, placement of antenna, and time of day. Not sure if an outdoor antenna would work better but this antenna is small and very easy to pack away which would make it perfect for camping and for when your cable or satellite goes out.
Works as advertised. Easy set up. Good quality

The antenna works. Picture comes in super clear. Easy to install. I will say the sticky pads it comes with are pretty weak and after a week the antenna was falling off the wall. Easy fix with some better stick pads. Overall i would suggest this product to a friend.
Beats price vs. Comcast.Not as many channels but who watches 130 channels anyway?
Easy install and worked right out of the box. No issues so far. I wish it had a stand because I don’t want to stick it to my window. I just leaned it up again the window glass and it’s working fine.

I recently purchased the 2019 120 mile range antenna and matched it to a fire TV DVR.  I was pleasantly surprised to find that it gave access to 38 stations, and the digital quality is great.  Installation was easy, and with the generous cable length it did not take long to find the best reception location.
Great antenna and after a update I lost a bunch of channels so I figured I'd try a new antenna since a a signal booster did little.This is easy to install and quality of the pic looks better.

It’s my first time to use an HD Antenna and it really work great. I got 71 channels and most importantly I got my favorite channels...It was easy to assemble. I just follow instructions that is in the package.

This is one of the smartest purchases I have made! I was so tired of how expensive my cable bill had become...and I didn't even watch the majority of channels that were related to my cable package. This antenna is providing me with about a dozen channels - including all of my local stations that I wanted/needed. The reception is crystal clear. Plus, this was so simple and easy to install! Strongly encourage purchasing this antenna!
This HD was easy to install and the picture is crystal clear. Overall, this is an excellent antenna, as I was finally able to cancel cable. I receive my local channels and many more.

I live in a very rural area, the house on a downhill slope.  I had never used this type of antenna before, but found it very easy to use!!  I put it on a TV that previously received zero channels and was immediately able to get 42 channels.  Very pleased!!  Highly recommend.

I was a bit dubious as to how well this thing would work, but it works GREAT !!  I'm getting great over the air reception of local broadcast channels, and it does not cost me a cent.  I've found that if you rotate the antenna by 90 degrees, i.e. so that it faces east/west instead of north/south, you can pick up a different set of channels.  Very happy with this purchase, and would highly recommend.
Works great. We have no WiFi where where we are at and we now get local channels. We put on a window and works Wonderful. Great product.

This antenna was a great answer to being able to receive over the air digital tv reception without having to mount an outdoor antenna. Hookup was simple and fast. Lots of stations including major network. Happy wife.
Worked well and easy to setup. Great picture quality and good channel lineup.

Works great!  Cutting the chord and this was the answer for us!  over 40 channels, including all four major networks came in Chrystal clear! Will be adding another one shortly for a second TV. Way better than paying cable company thousands of dollars.. Moved to the second floor and worked much better.  Have to play with it, but the picture was great, and I received 17 local channels.

I 100% recommend if you’re trying to avoid paying for cable. All the sports channels are on here and many local channels like A&E, and the CW.
Great antenna for picking up free channels, I really like how it works.

After cutting cable, we needed our local channels back and what a great option with this Antenna.  Setup was easy and seamless.  The color comes through great on the HD side.  We will be buying more for our other TVs!

My wife and I purchased one. We had no idea how it would work besides what we were told by a few friends. They swore by the simplicity and the results. We are happy to say they were spot on. I now have about 40 more stations and they are beautifully seen on the screen.  The problem is that there is so little I want to watch--except PBS and 60 Minutes.  My friend installed it in about 5 minutes.  (I only use an antenna)

I purchased the "U  MUST HAVE" digital antenna recently. I hooked it up this week and was very delighted with the ease of making the connections. This product works! I was trying to rely on an older antenna (rabbit ears) that sat on the TV stand but had little luck in pulling in a channel and holding it. We are so glad that we bought this! We got rid of our cable tv because of the outrageous bills we were receiving! Install was super easy. I just hid the antenna part behind the TV and it works really well. No rabbit ears or anything like that. Super impressed with this product!

Great antenna, excellent picture quality, and descent channel reception!Will update my review and rating once after I give this product more time and they honor the free hd digital antenna as promised!

The antenna was very easy to install physically in the wall. I had 3 double sided foam tape. I live in an area where the TV signal is not good at all. I was using another antenna and as soon as I installed it and set it up, the difference was huge. Now I can see all the free tv channels available in my area.

It was easy to install. Scanning for channels was a challenge as the instructions lacked information re: different scanning techniques on individual TV’s settings. Once I figured out how to scan for digital and analog channels, I found more channels than I even expected, and they were crystal clear! Amazing!
We really like our new antenna!  It was very easy to install.  We get twice as many channels than we did with our old antenna and the signal is much better.
I like it, very good product, excellent picture quality,highly recommended

I love this antenna. It was so simple to attach to my television. I did an air search and it captured over 50 channels. I have been able to eliminate big cable bill. I am loving my new ultra thin HDTV antenna, I can’t believe I have been throwing my money away in cable services to watch my local channels! This antenna is thin , easy to use and works great in my 4K TV! Absolutely love it! Thank you!
Great quality once to find the sweet spot in the room.

Easy instillation, It was shipped quickly-2nd day after purchase!  A great solution to my mom recently moving in with us, she wanted something to show all the digital channels since she would be without cable for awhile.She’s really excited to explore all the channels and catching up on old tv shows!

it works well at the distance advertised, give or take a couple of miles. I use it for the tv in my motorhome, when I am out of range of the others I have when, I don't have cable to hook up to or want some channels other than whatcable offers me.
